cards.name: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon
cards.text: [+2]: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to any target. [−X]: Exile each permanent with mana value X or less that's one or more colors. [−10]: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: If you choose to put permanent cards with morph onto the battlefield with the third ability, you must put them onto the battlefield face up.
Ugin, the Spirit Dragon is not a Dragon card; that is, he doesn’t have the creature type Dragon. Spells and abilities that refer to Dragon cards or Dragons don’t apply to Ugin.
If a permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
The converted mana cost of a token that isn’t a copy of another object is 0. A token that is a copy of another object has the same mana cost as that object.
A permanent card is an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card.

foreignNames.name: Ugin der Geisterdrache

cards.name: Alpine Watchdog

foreignNames.name: 高山の番犬

foreignNames.name: Cão de Guarda Alpino

cards.name: Baneslayer Angel
cards.text: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons
cards.flavor: Some angels protect the meek and innocent. Others seek out and smite evil wherever it lurks.

rulings.text: “Protection from Demons and from Dragons” means the following: -- Baneslayer Angel can't be blocked by creatures with the creature type Demon or the creature type Dragon. -- Baneslayer Angel can't be targeted abilities from sources with the creature type Demon or the creature type Dragon, or by spells with either of those types. -- All damage that would be dealt to Baneslayer Angel by sources with the creature type Demon or the creature type Dragon is prevented. -- Baneslayer Angel can't be enchanted by Auras or equipped by artifacts that have somehow gotten the creature type Demon or the creature type Dragon.

foreignNames.name: Bannender Engel

foreignNames.flavor: Einige Engel beschützen die Schwachen und Unschuldigen. Andere stöbern das Böse auf und erschlagen es.

cards.name: Basri Ket
cards.text: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn. [−2]: Whenever one or more nontoken creatures attack this turn, create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. [−6]: You get an emblem with 'At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.'

rulings.text: The delayed triggered ability of Basri’s second ability triggers if any nontoken creatures attack, and it counts how many nontoken creatures attacked. Attacking nontoken creatures that leave combat before the triggered ability resolves are counted. Token creatures that are attacking don’t stop the ability from triggering and aren’t counted.

You choose which player or planeswalker each Soldier token is attacking. They don’t have to be attacking the same players or planeswalkers that the nontoken creatures are attacking, and they don’t have to be attacking the same player or planeswalker as each other.

Although the Soldiers are attacking creatures, they were never declared as attacking creatures. This means that abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks won’t trigger when the Soldiers enter the battlefield attacking.
Any effects that say that the Soldiers can’t attack (such as that of Propaganda) affect only the declaration of attackers. They won’t stop the Soldier tokens from entering the battlefield attacking.
The Soldier token created by Basri’s last ability can’t attack during the turn you create it unless it gains haste somehow.

cards.name: Basri's Lieutenant
cards.text: Vigilance, protection from multicolored When Basri's Lieutenant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Whenever Basri's Lieutenant or another creature you control dies, if it had a +1/+1 counter on it, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

rulings.text: Basri’s Lieutenant can be the target of its own enters-the-battlefield triggered ability.
The second triggered ability of Basri’s Lieutenant triggers just once if the dying creature has +1/+1 counters on it, no matter how many of those counters it has.
If Basri’s Lieutenant dies at the same time as other creatures, its last ability will trigger for any of the creatures that had a +1/+1 counter on it, including itself.

If a creature with +1/+1 counters on it receives a greater or equal number of -1/-1 counters and this causes it to be destroyed by lethal damage or put into its owner’s graveyard for having 0 or less toughness, the last ability triggers. This is because the ability checks the creature as it last existed on the battlefield, and it still had those counters on it at that point.

foreignNames.name: Basris Leutnant

cards.name: Containment Priest
cards.text: Flash If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
cards.flavor: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.

rulings.text: Containment Priest’s last ability won’t affect any creatures that were cast, including ones cast from unusual zones such as your graveyard.

If a noncreature card wasn’t cast and is entering the battlefield as a creature (due to an effect such as that of March of the Machines), it will be exiled. Conversely, if a creature card wasn’t cast and is entering the battlefield as a noncreature permanent (for example, Heliod, Sun-Crowned with insufficient devotion), it won’t be exiled.
If Containment Priest enters the battlefield without being cast, its ability won’t exile itself.
If Containment Priest enters the battlefield at the same time as other creatures, its ability won’t affect those creatures.

cards.name: Faith's Fetters
cards.text: Enchant permanent When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

rulings.text: If the target permanent is an illegal target by the time Faith’s Fetters tries to resolve, it doesn’t resolve. It won’t enter the battlefield, so its enters-the-battlefield ability won’t trigger.
Faith’s Fetters doesn’t stop static abilities, triggered abilities, or mana abilities from working. A mana ability is an ability that produces mana, not an ability that costs mana.

cards.name: Falconer Adept
cards.text: Whenever Falconer Adept attacks, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.
cards.flavor: 'My falcons are family, as much as any other member of my clan.'

rulings.text: You choose which player or planeswalker the Bird token is attacking. It doesn’t have to be attacking the same player or planeswalker that Falconer Adept is attacking.

Although the Bird is an attacking creature, it was never declared as an attacking creature. This means that abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks won’t trigger when it enters the battlefield attacking.
Any effects that say that the Bird can’t attack (such as that of Propaganda) affect only the declaration of attackers. They won’t stop the Bird token from entering the battlefield attacking.

cards.name: Griffin Aerie
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: When griffins started nesting atop the northern tower, the castellan worried they'd be a nuisance. Instead, they took the entire castle under their protection.

rulings.text: You create just one Griffin token, no matter how much life you’ve gained past 3 life.

Griffin Aerie’s ability looks at how much life you’ve gained in the turn, even if it wasn’t on the battlefield when you gained life. It doesn’t care if you also lost life, even if you lost more life than you gained.
If you haven’t gained 3 life by the time your end step begins, Griffin Aerie’s ability won’t trigger at all.

foreignNames.name: Greifenhorst
foreignNames.text: Zu Beginn deines Endsegments und falls du in diesem Zug 3 oder mehr Lebenspunkte dazuerhalten hast, erzeuge einen 2/2 weißen Greif-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.

foreignNames.text: 당신의 종료단 시작에, 당신이 이번 턴에 생명 3점 이상을 얻었다면, 비행을 가진 2/2 백색 그리핀 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 북쪽 탑 꼭대기에 그리핀들이 둥지를 틀기 시작했을 때, 성주는 그것들이 골칫거리가 될까 걱정했다. 그와는 반대로, 그것들이 성 전체를 보호해 주었다.

foreignNames.name: Ninho dos Grifos

foreignNames.name: Гнездо Грифонов

foreignNames.name: 狮鹫栖巢

foreignNames.name: 獅鷲棲巢

cards.originalText: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

cards.name: Idol of Endurance
cards.text: When Idol of Endurance enters the battlefield, exile all creature cards with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard until Idol of Endurance leaves the battlefield. {1}{W}, {T}: Until end of turn, you may cast a creature spell from among cards exiled with Idol of Endurance without paying its mana cost.

rulings.text: The exiled cards return to your graveyard immediately after Idol of Endurance leaves the battlefield. Any cards that had left exile before then (most likely because they were cast with Idol of Endurance’s second ability) remain in their current zone.
If a card in a player’s graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

The last ability of Idol of Endurance doesn’t change when you may cast those creature spells. Normally this means during your main phase while the stack is empty, but you can cast a creature spell with flash at other times.

If you cast a spell “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, those must be paid to cast the spell.
If a spell has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

If you cast a spell with Idol of Endurance’s last ability, it becomes a new object. If it returns to exile, it’s no longer exiled with Idol of Endurance, and won’t be returned to your graveyard once Idol of Endurance leaves the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Abgott der Zähigkeit
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Abgott der Zähigkeit ins Spiel kommt, schicke alle Kreaturenkarten mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 3 oder weniger aus deinem Friedhof ins Exil, bis der Abgott der Zähigkeit das Spiel verlässt. {1}{W}, {T}: Bis zum Ende des Zuges kannst du von den Karten, die mit dem Abgott der Zähigkeit ins Exil geschickt wurden, einen Kreaturenzauber wirken, ohne seine Manakosten zu bezahlen.

foreignNames.name: Ídolo de la resistencia

foreignNames.name: Idole de l'endurance

foreignNames.name: Idolo della Perseveranza

foreignNames.name: 忍耐の偶像

foreignNames.name: 인내의 우상

foreignNames.name: Ídolo de Resistência
foreignNames.text: Quando Ídolo de Resistência entrar no campo de batalha, exile todos os cards de criatura com custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a 3 de seu cemitério até que Ídolo de Resistência deixe o campo de batalha. {1}{W}, {T}: Até o final do turno, você pode conjurar uma mágica de criatura dentre os cards exilados com Ídolo de Resistência sem pagar seu custo de mana.

foreignNames.name: Идол Выносливости

foreignNames.name: 坚白雕像

cards.name: Light of Promise
cards.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has 'Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature.'
cards.flavor: The light washed over him, and in the wind he heard the roars of all the pridemates who had come before.

rulings.text: If enchanted creature is dealt lethal damage at the same time that you gain life, it won’t receive a counter from its ability in time to save it.

Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, the ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
If you gain an amount of life “for each” of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability triggers only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won’t cause the ability to trigger, even though it caused your team’s life total to increase.

cards.name: Makeshift Battalion
cards.text: Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.
cards.flavor: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.

rulings.text: Makeshift Battalion and the other attacking creatures don’t have to be attacking the same player or planeswalker.
Once Makeshift Battalion’s ability has triggered, it doesn’t matter how many creatures are still attacking when that ability resolves.

cards.name: Mangara, the Diplomat
cards.text: Lifelink Whenever an opponent attacks with creatures, if two or more of those creatures are attacking you and/or planeswalkers you control, draw a card. Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, draw a card.

rulings.text: If some of the attacking creatures leave the battlefield while Mangara’s triggered ability is on the stack, use the player or planeswalker they were attacking before they left to determine whether you draw a card. On the other hand, if they’re removed from combat without leaving the battlefield, use their current information to determine that they’re not attacking you or a planeswalker you control anymore.
If your opponent attacks you with one creature and your planeswalker with another, you draw a card.
You draw just one card, no matter how many creatures are attacking you and your planeswalkers beyond the second.
An ability that triggers when a player casts a spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
Players can cast spells and activate abilities after the triggered ability resolves but before the spell that caused it to trigger does.

foreignNames.name: Mangara der Diplomat
foreignNames.text: Lebensverknüpfung Immer wenn ein Gegner Kreaturen als Angreifer deklariert und falls zwei oder mehr jener Kreaturen dich und/oder Planeswalker, die du kontrollierst, angreifen, ziehe eine Karte. Immer wenn ein Gegner seinen zweiten Zauberspruch innerhalb desselben Zuges wirkt, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignNames.text: Vínculo vital. Siempre que un oponente ataque con criaturas, si dos o más de esas criaturas te atacan y/o atacan a planeswalkers que controlas, roba una carta. Siempre que un oponente lance su segundo hechizo cada turno, roba una carta.

foreignNames.text: Lien de vie À chaque fois qu'un adversaire attaque avec des créatures, si au moins deux de ces créatures vous attaquent et/ou attaquent un planeswalker que vous contrôlez, piochez une carte. À chaque fois qu'un adversaire lance son deuxième sort à chaque tour, piochez une carte.

foreignNames.name: Mangara, il Diplomatico
foreignNames.text: Legame vitale Ogniqualvolta un avversario attacca con creature, se due o più di quelle creature stanno attaccando te e/o i planeswalker che controlli, pesca una carta. Ogniqualvolta un avversario lancia la sua seconda magia in ogni turno, pesca una carta.

foreignNames.name: 外交官、マンガラ
foreignNames.text: 絆魂 対戦相手１人がクリーチャーで攻撃するたび、それらのクリーチャーのうち２体以上があなたやあなたがコントロールしているプレインズウォーカーを攻撃している場合、カードを１枚引く。 対戦相手１人が各ターンの自分の２つ目の呪文を唱えるたび、カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・クレリック

foreignNames.name: 외교술사, 망가라
foreignNames.text: 생명연결 상대가 생물들로 공격할 때마다, 그 생물들 중 두 개 이상이 당신 및/또는 당신이 조종하는 플레인즈워커를 공격하고 있다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다. 상대가 매 턴 자신의 두 번째 주문을 발동할 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignNames.name: Mangara, o Diplomata
foreignNames.text: Vínculo com a vida Toda vez que um oponente atacar com criaturas, se duas ou mais daquelas criaturas estiverem atacando você e/ou planeswalkers que você controla, compre um card. Toda vez que um oponente conjurar sua segunda mágica em cada turno, compre um card.

foreignNames.name: Мангара, Дипломат
foreignNames.text: Цепь жизни Каждый раз, когда оппонент атакует существами, если два или более из тех существ атакуют вас и/или planeswalker'ов под вашим контролем, возьмите карту. Каждый раз, когда оппонент разыгрывает свое второе заклинание в каждом ходу, возьмите карту.

foreignNames.name: 使节曼格拉
foreignNames.text: 系命 每当任一对手以生物攻击时，若其中有两个或更多生物攻击你和／或由你操控的鹏洛客，则你抓一张牌。 每当任一对手施放每回合中其第二个咒语时，你抓一张牌。

foreignNames.name: 使節曼格拉
foreignNames.text: 繫命 每當任一對手以生物攻擊時，若其中有兩個或更多生物攻擊你和／或由你操控的鵬洛客，則你抽一張牌。 每當任一對手施放每回合中其第二個咒語時，你抽一張牌。

cards.originalText: Lifelink Whenever an opponent attacks with creatures, if two or more of those creatures are attacking you and/or planeswalkers you control, draw a card. Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Nine Lives
cards.text: Hexproof If a source would deal damage to you, prevent that damage and put an incarnation counter on Nine Lives. When there are nine or more incarnation counters on Nine Lives, exile it. When Nine Lives leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

rulings.text: If more than one source deals damage to you at once, prevent the damage from each of them and put that many incarnation counters on Nine Lives, even if this causes more than nine incarnation counters to be on Nine Lives. Leave it to cats to abuse loopholes.
If damage that a source would deal to you can’t be prevented, you still put an incarnation counter on Nine Lives.
Once the first triggered ability is on the stack, it won’t trigger again, even if more damage is prevented and more incarnation counters are put onto it.
If you counter the first triggered ability or otherwise remove it from the stack, it will just trigger again immediately if Nine Lives still has nine or more incarnation counters on it.
The last ability of Nine Lives triggers no matter how it leaves the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Neun Leben
foreignNames.text: Fluchsicher Falls eine Quelle dir Schadenspunkte zufügen würde, verhindere diesen Schaden und lege eine Inkarnationsmarke auf Neun Leben. Wenn neun oder mehr Inkarnationsmarken auf Neun Leben liegen, schicke sie ins Exil. Wenn Neun Leben das Spiel verlässt, verlierst du die Partie.

foreignNames.name: Nueve vidas
foreignNames.text: Antimaleficio. Si una fuente fuera a hacerte daño, prevén ese daño y pon un contador de encarnación sobre las Nueve vidas. Cuando haya nueve o más contadores de encarnación sobre las Nueve vidas, exílialas. Cuando las Nueve vidas dejen el campo de batalla, pierdes el juego.

foreignNames.name: Neuf vies
foreignNames.text: Défense talismanique Si une source devait vous infliger des blessures, prévenez ces blessures et mettez un marqueur « incarnation » sur les Neuf vies. Quand il y a au moins neuf marqueurs « incarnation » sur les Neuf vies, exilez-les. Quand les Neuf vies quittent le champ de bataille, vous perdez la partie.

foreignNames.name: Nove Vite
foreignNames.text: Anti-malocchio Se una fonte sta per infliggerti danno, previeni quel danno e metti un segnalino incarnazione sulle Nove Vite. Quando ci sono nove o più segnalini incarnazione sulle Nove Vite, esiliale. Quando le Nove Vite lasciano il campo di battaglia, perdi la partita.

foreignNames.name: 九つの命
foreignNames.text: 呪禁 発生源１つがあなたにダメージを与えるなら、そのダメージを軽減し、九つの命の上に具現カウンターを１個置く。 九つの命の上に具現カウンターが９個以上あるとき、これを追放する。 九つの命が戦場を離れたとき、あなたはこのゲームに敗北する。

foreignNames.name: 아홉 개의 목숨
foreignNames.text: 방호 어떤 원천이 당신에게 피해를 입히려 한다면, 그 피해를 방지하고 아홉 개의 목숨에 현신 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다. 아홉 개의 목숨에 현신 카운터가 아홉 개 이상 놓여 있을 때, 아홉 개의 목숨을 추방한다. 아홉 개의 목숨이 전장을 떠날 때, 당신은 게임에서 패배한다.

foreignNames.name: Nove Vidas
foreignNames.text: Resistência a magia Se uma fonte causaria dano a você, previna aquele dano e coloque um marcador de encarnação em Nove Vidas. Quando houver nove ou mais marcadores de encarnação em Nove Vidas, exile-a. Quando Nove Vidas deixa o campo de batalha, você perde o jogo.

foreignNames.name: Девять Жизней
foreignNames.text: Порчеустойчивость Если источник должен нанести вам повреждения, предотвратите те повреждения и положите один жетон инкарнации на Девять Жизней. Когда на Девяти Жизнях есть девять или более жетонов инкарнации, изгоните их. Когда Девять Жизней покидают поле битвы, вы проигрываете партию.

foreignNames.name: 九命护身
foreignNames.text: 辟邪 如果某来源将对你造成伤害，则防止该伤害且在九命护身上放置一个转生指示物。 当九命护身上有九个或更多转生指示物时，将它放逐。 当九命护身离开战场时，你输掉这盘游戏。

foreignNames.name: 九命護身
foreignNames.text: 辟邪 如果某來源將對你造成傷害，則防止該傷害且在九命護身上放置一個轉生指示物。 當九命護身上有九個或更多轉生指示物時，將它放逐。 當九命護身離開戰場時，你輸掉這盤遊戲。

cards.originalText: Hexproof If a source would deal damage to you, prevent that damage and put an incarnation counter on Nine Lives. When there are nine or more incarnation counters on Nine Lives, exile it. When Nine Lives leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

cards.name: Pack Leader
cards.text: Other Dogs you control get +1/+1. Whenever Pack Leader attacks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn to Dogs you control.
cards.flavor: He will be your loyal champion, and his pack your protectors. All he asks for is a full belly, a spot by the fire, and all the love in your heart.

rulings.text: Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to a Dog you control may become lethal if Pack Leader leaves the battlefield during that turn.
Once Pack Leader attacks, its effect prevents damage that would be dealt to Dogs you control even if Pack Leader leaves the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Rudelführer
foreignNames.text: Andere Hunde, die du kontrollierst, erhalten +1/+1. Immer wenn der Rudelführer angreift, verhindere allen Kampfschaden, der in diesem Zug Hunden, die du kontrollierst, zugefügt würde.
foreignNames.flavor: Er ist dein loyaler Champion und sein Rudel wird dich beschützen. Alles, was er fordert, ist ein voller Bauch, ein Platz am Feuer und all die Liebe in deinem Herzen.

foreignNames.name: Líder de la jauría
foreignNames.text: Los otros Perros que controlas obtienen +1/+1. Siempre que el Líder de la jauría ataque, prevén todo el daño de combate que se fuera a hacer este turno a Perros que controlas.
foreignNames.flavor: Será tu fiel campeón; y su jauría, tus protectores. Solo te pide a cambio tener la barriga llena, un sitio al lado del fuego y todo el amor en tu corazón.

foreignNames.name: Chef de la meute
foreignNames.text: Les autres chiens que vous contrôlez gagnent +1/+1. À chaque fois que le Chef de la meute attaque, prévenez toutes les blessures de combat qui devraient être infligées ce tour-ci aux chiens que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: Il sera votre fidèle champion, et sa meute vous protègera. Tout ce qu'il demande en échange, c'est un estomac rempli, une place près du feu, et tout l'amour que vous pourrez lui offrir.

foreignNames.name: Capo del Branco
foreignNames.text: Gli altri Canidi che controlli prendono +1/+1. Ogniqualvolta il Capo del Branco attacca, previeni tutto il danno da combattimento che verrebbe inflitto in questo turno ai Canidi che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: Sarà il tuo campione fedele e il suo branco ti proteggerà. In cambio, non chiede altro che lo stomaco pieno, un posto accanto al fuoco e tutto l'amore di cui sei capace.

foreignNames.name: 群れを導くもの
foreignNames.text: 他の、あなたがコントロールしている犬は＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。 群れを導くものが攻撃するたび、このターン、あなたがコントロールしている犬が受ける戦闘ダメージをすべて軽減する。
foreignNames.flavor: 彼は忠実な勇者となり、その群れは君を守るだろう。彼が望むのは満腹と火の傍の居場所、そして君の心からの愛情だ。

foreignNames.name: 무리 대장
foreignNames.text: 당신이 조종하는 다른 개들은 +1/+1을 받는다. 무리 대장이 공격할 때마다, 이번 턴에 당신이 조종하는 개들에게 입혀질 모든 피해를 방지한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그는 당신의 충직한 용사가 될 것이며, 그의 무리는 당신의 수호자가 될 것이다. 그가 요구하는 것은 배를 곯지 않고, 불가에 한 자리를 얻으며, 당신의 사랑을 독차지하는 것뿐이다.

foreignNames.name: Líder da Matilha
foreignNames.text: Os outros Cães que você controla recebem +1/+1. Toda vez que Líder da Matilha atacar, previna todo dano de combate que seria causado neste turno a Cães que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: Ele será seu leal companheiro e sua matilha te protegerá. Em troca, ele pede apenas que mantenha sua barriga cheia, seu lugar junto ao fogo e todo o amor no seu coração.

foreignNames.name: Вожак Стаи
foreignNames.text: Другие Собаки под вашим контролем получают +1/+1. Каждый раз, когда Вожак Стаи атакует, предотвратите все боевые повреждения, которые должны быть нанесены в этом ходу Собакам под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: Он станет твоим верным поборником, а его стая будет защищать тебя. Все, что он просит взамен, — это полный живот, место у огня и всю любовь, что есть в твоем сердце.

foreignNames.name: 犬群领袖
foreignNames.text: 由你操控的其他狗得+1/+1。 每当犬群领袖攻击时，防止本回合中将对由你操控的狗造成之所有战斗伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 它会成为你的忠诚勇士，它身边犬群会成为你的贴身护卫。而它要求的，不过是果腹伙食、炉边歇息和满心关爱。

foreignNames.name: 犬群領袖
foreignNames.text: 由你操控的其他狗得+1/+1。 每當犬群領袖攻擊時，防止本回合中將對由你操控的狗造成之所有戰鬥傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 牠會成為你的忠誠勇士，牠身邊犬群會成為你的貼身護衛。而牠要求的，不過是果腹伙食、爐邊歇息和滿心關愛。

cards.originalText: Other Dogs you control get +1/+1. Whenever Pack Leader attacks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn to Dogs you control.

cards.name: Rambunctious Mutt
cards.text: When Rambunctious Mutt enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.
cards.flavor: Emphatic words with powerful gestures. Clearly this was playtime.

foreignNames.name: Tollender Köter
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Tollende Köter ins Spiel kommt, zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung deiner Wahl, das bzw. die ein Gegner kontrolliert.
foreignNames.flavor: Klare Worte mit kraftvollen Gesten. Das war eindeutig Spielzeit.

foreignNames.name: Mestizo revoltoso
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Mestizo revoltoso entre al campo de batalla, destruye el artefacto o encantamiento objetivo que controla un oponente.
foreignNames.flavor: Palabras enérgicas con expresiones exageradas. Estaba claro que era la hora de jugar.

foreignNames.name: Cabot turbulent
foreignNames.text: Quand le Cabot turbulent arrive sur le champ de bataille, détruisez un artefact ou un enchantement ciblé qu'un adversaire contrôle.
foreignNames.flavor: Des paroles autoritaires et des gestes menaçants. De toute évidence, il voulait jouer.

foreignNames.name: Meticcio Indisciplinato
foreignNames.text: Quando il Meticcio Indisciplinato entra nel campo di battaglia, distruggi un artefatto o un incantesimo bersaglio controllato da un avversario.
foreignNames.flavor: Parole enfatiche accompagnate da gesti poderosi... Un chiaro segnale che era l'ora di giocare.

foreignNames.name: やんちゃな犬
foreignNames.text: やんちゃな犬が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールしているアーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 勢いのある口調に大げさな身振り。どう見たって遊びの時間だ。

foreignNames.name: 제멋대로인 개
foreignNames.text: 제멋대로인 개가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 마법물체 또는 부여마법을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 강한 말투와 힘찬 몸짓. 놀이 시간인 것이 틀림없었다.

foreignNames.name: Vira-lata Bagunceiro
foreignNames.text: Quando Vira-lata Bagunceiro entrar no campo de batalha, destrua o artefato ou encantamento alvo que um oponente controla.
foreignNames.flavor: Palavras enfáticas com gestos fortes. Com certeza estava na hora de brincar.

foreignNames.name: Шкодливая Псина
foreignNames.text: Когда Шкодливая Псина выходит на поле битвы, уничтожьте целевой артефакт или чары под контролем оппонента.
foreignNames.flavor: Властные жесты, произнесенные с выражением слова... Ясно, что хозяин хотел поиграть.

foreignNames.name: 难驯杂犬
foreignNames.text: 当难驯杂犬进战场时，消灭目标由对手操控的神器或结界。
foreignNames.flavor: 急切语气加上威风动作，显然这是玩乐时间。

foreignNames.name: 難馴雜犬
foreignNames.text: 當難馴雜犬進戰場時，消滅目標由對手操控的神器或結界。
foreignNames.flavor: 急切語氣加上威風動作，顯然這是玩樂時間。

cards.originalText: When Rambunctious Mutt enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

cards.name: Revitalize
cards.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: 'A potion is no substitute for a skilled surgeon, but it will hold your bits in.' —Torricks, battlefield medic

foreignNames.name: Revitalisieren
foreignNames.text: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu. Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ein Heiltrank ist kein Ersatz für einen Medikus, aber fürs Erste hält er deine Innereien an Ort und Stelle.' —Torricks, Frontmedikus

foreignNames.name: Revivificar
foreignNames.text: Ganas 3 vidas. Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: 'La poción no sustituye la labor de un buen cirujano, pero evitará que se te salgan las tripas.'  —Torricks, médico de guerra

foreignNames.name: Revitaliser
foreignNames.text: Vous gagnez 3 points de vie. Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Une potion ne vaut pas un bon chirurgien, mais ça retient les morceaux. » —Torricks, carabin de campagne

foreignNames.name: Rivitalizzare
foreignNames.text: Guadagni 3 punti vita. Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Una pozione non può sostituire un abile chirurgo, ma tiene insieme i pezzi.' —Torricks, medico da campo

foreignNames.name: 活力回復
foreignNames.text: あなたは３点のライフを得る。 カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「薬は腕利きの医師の代わりにはならないが、しばらく保たせることはできる。」 ――戦場の衛生兵、トリックス

foreignNames.name: 재활
foreignNames.text: 당신은 생명 3점을 얻는다. 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: '물약이 솜씨 좋은 의사만은 못하겠지만, 견디게는 해 줄 걸세.' —전투 치유사, 토릭스

foreignNames.name: Revitalizar
foreignNames.text: Você ganha 3 pontos de vida. Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Uma poção não substitui um bom cirurgião, mas mantém os pedaços no lugar.' — Torricks, socorrista do campo de batalha

foreignNames.name: Восстановление Сил
foreignNames.text: Вы получаете 3 жизни. Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Зелье не заменит умелого хирурга, но у тебя хотя бы кишки не вывалятся». — Торрикс, полевой медик

foreignNames.name: 再现活力
foreignNames.text: 你获得3点生命。 抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「药水虽代替不了妙手回春的医士，但好歹能堵上你的伤口。」 ～战场医护员托瑞克

foreignNames.name: 再現活力
foreignNames.text: 你獲得3點生命。 抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「藥水雖代替不了妙手回春的醫士，但好歹能堵上你的傷口。」 ～戰場醫護員托瑞克

cards.originalText: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

cards.name: Runed Halo
cards.text: As Runed Halo enters the battlefield, choose a card name.'  You have protection from the chosen card name.'  (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything with that name.' )

rulings.text: Runed Halo can’t protect you from tokens unless those tokens have the same name as the card name you choose.

Some cards can have alternative names, such as split cards, adventurer cards, double-faced cards, and so on. You may choose one of the two names the card can have; Runed Halo won’t protect you from the other name'.

foreignNames.name: Runenverzierter Schein
foreignNames.text: Sowie der Runenverzierte Schein ins Spiel kommt, bestimme einen Kartennamen. Du hast Schutz vor dem bestimmten Kartennamen. (Nichts mit diesem Namen kann dich als Ziel haben, dir Schaden zufügen oder dich verzaubern.)

foreignNames.name: Halo rúnico
foreignNames.text: En cuanto el Halo rúnico entre al campo de batalla, elige un nombre de carta. Tienes protección contra el nombre de carta elegido. (No puedes ser objetivo, recibir daño o estar encantado por nada con ese nombre.)

foreignNames.name: Halo serti de runes
foreignNames.text: Au moment où le Halo serti de runes arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez un nom de carte. Vous avez la protection contre le nom de carte choisi. (Vous ne pouvez pas être ciblé, blessé ou enchanté par une source avec ce nom.)

foreignNames.name: Aureola Runica
foreignNames.text: Mentre l'Aureola Runica entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli il nome di una carta. Hai protezione dal nome di carta scelto. (Non puoi essere bersagliato, non ti può essere inflitto danno, né puoi essere incantato da qualcosa con il nome scelto.)

foreignNames.name: ルーンの光輪
foreignNames.text: ルーンの光輪が戦場に出るに際し、カード名１つを選ぶ。 あなたはプロテクション（その選ばれたカード名）を持つ。（あなたはその名前を持つものによっては、対象にならず、ダメージを受けず、エンチャントされない。）

foreignNames.name: 룬이 새겨진 광륜
foreignNames.text: 룬이 새겨진 광륜이 전장에 들어오면서, 카드 이름 하나를 선택한다. 당신은 선택된 카드 이름으로부터 보호를 가진다. (당신은 그 이름을 가진 주문의 목표로 정해질 수 없고, 그 이름을 가진 원천으로부터 피해를 입지 않으며, 그 이름을 가진 부여마법에 부여될 수 없다.)

foreignNames.name: Auréola Rúnica
foreignNames.text: Conforme Auréola Rúnica entrar no campo de batalha, escolha um nome de card. Você tem proteção contra o nome de card escolhido. (Você não pode ser alvo, causar dano nem ser encantado por nada com aquele nome.)

foreignNames.name: Рунный Нимб
foreignNames.text: При выходе Рунного Нимба на поле битвы выберите имя карты. Вы имеете Защиту от выбранного имени карты. (Объекты с тем именем не могут делать вас своей целью, наносить вам повреждения или зачаровывать вас.)

foreignNames.name: 符文光晕
foreignNames.text: 于符文光晕进战场时，选择一个牌名。 你具有反该牌名保护异能。（你不能被该名称的东西指定为目标、造成伤害或是结附。）

foreignNames.name: 符文光暈
foreignNames.text: 於符文光暈進戰場時，選擇一個牌名。 你具有反該牌名保護異能。（你不能被該名稱的東西指定為目標、造成傷害或是結附。）

cards.originalText: As Runed Halo enters the battlefield, choose a card name.'  You have protection from the chosen card name.'  (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything with that name.' )

cards.name: Sanctum of Tranquil Light
cards.text: {5}{W}: Tap target creature. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each Shrine you control.
cards.flavor: An untroubled mind Dwells in perfect harmony With a peaceful heart.

rulings.text: The cost reduction applies only to generic mana in the cost of the activated ability. It can’t reduce the {W} requirement.
Each Shrine has an ability that counts the number of Shrines you control. These abilities include the Shrine they’re printed on.
Shrines count only enchantments with the subtype Shrine. Other cards with “shrine” in their name (such as Jungle Shrine, Luxa River Shrine, and Nantuko Shrine) don’t count.

foreignNames.name: Heiligtum des stillen Lichts
foreignNames.text: {5}{W}: Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Diese Fähigkeit kostet beim Aktivieren für jeden Schrein, den du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.
foreignNames.flavor: Eine unbekümmerte Seele lebt in perfekter Harmonie mit einem friedvollen Herzen.

foreignNames.name: Santuario de la luz tranquila
foreignNames.text: {5}{W}: Gira la criatura objetivo. Te cuesta {1} menos activar esta habilidad por cada Altar que controlas.
foreignNames.flavor: Mente tranquila en perfecta armonía; corazón calmo.

foreignNames.name: Sanctuaire de la lumière paisible
foreignNames.text: {5}{W} : Engagez la créature ciblée. Cette capacité coûte {1} de moins à activer pour chaque reliquaire que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: Un esprit serein Vit en parfaite harmonie Avec un cœur pur.

foreignNames.name: Santuario della Luce Tranquilla
foreignNames.text: {5}{W}: TAPpa una creatura bersaglio. Questa abilità costa {1} in meno per essere attivata per ogni Santuario che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: Una mente imperturbabile vive in perfetta armonia con un cuore sereno.

foreignNames.name: 穏やかな光の聖域
foreignNames.text: {5}{W}：クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。この能力を起動するためのコストは、あなたがコントロールしている祭殿１つにつき{1}少なくなる。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のエンチャント — 祭殿
foreignNames.flavor: 曇りなき 静けき心 調和せむ

foreignNames.name: 평온한 빛의 성소
foreignNames.text: {5}{W}: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 탭한다. 이 능력은 당신이 조종하는 성지 한 개당 활성화하는 데 {1}이 덜 든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 고요한 정신은 완벽한 조화 속에서 평화로운 마음과 함께 자리한다.

foreignNames.name: Santuário da Luz Tranquila
foreignNames.text: {5}{W}: Vire a criatura alvo. Esta habilidade custa {1} a menos para ser ativada para cada Sacrário que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: Uma mente plácida Vive em perfeita harmonia Com um coração pacífico.

foreignNames.name: Святилище Спокойного Света
foreignNames.text: {5}{W}: поверните целевое существо. Стоимость активации этой способности уменьшается на {1} за каждую Святыню под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: Безмятежный ум В соразмерности живет С покоем в сердце.

foreignNames.name: 宁光圣殿
foreignNames.text: {5}{W}：横置目标生物。你每操控一个祭祠，此异能便减少{1}来起动。
foreignNames.flavor: 平和无庸扰， 柔光温煦清风到， 静居宁心躁。

foreignNames.name: 寧光聖殿
foreignNames.text: {5}{W}：橫置目標生物。你每操控一個祭祠，此異能便減少{1}來起動。
foreignNames.flavor: 平和無庸擾， 柔光溫煦清風到， 靜居寧心躁。

cards.originalText: {5}{W}: Tap target creature. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each Shrine you control.

cards.name: Seasoned Hallowblade
cards.text: Discard a card: Tap Seasoned Hallowblade. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say destroy don't destroy it.)
cards.flavor: 'I don't know that I'll win every fight. But I have faith, and that's carried me this far.'

rulings.text: You can activate Seasoned Hallowblade’s ability even if nothing’s about to destroy it, even if it’s already tapped, and even if it already has indestructible.

foreignNames.name: Weiheklingenveteran
foreignNames.text: Wirf eine Karte ab: Tappe den Weiheklingenveteranen. Er erhält Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Schaden und Effekte, die „zerstören, zerstören ihn nicht.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich weiß nicht, ob ich jeden Kampf gewinnen werde. Aber mein Glaube hat mich bis hierher gebracht.'

foreignNames.name: Filoconsagrado veterano
foreignNames.text: Descartar una carta: Gira el Filoconsagrado veterano. Gana la habilidad de indestructible hasta el final del turno. (El daño y los efectos que dicen destruir no lo destruyen.)
foreignNames.flavor: 'No sé si venceré cada batalla. Pero tengo fe, y eso me llevó hasta donde estoy ahora'.

foreignNames.name: Sacrelame aguerri
foreignNames.text: Défaussez-vous d'une carte : Engagez le Sacrelame aguerri. Il acquiert l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Les blessures et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne le détruisent pas.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Je n'ai pas la certitude de gagner chaque combat. Mais j'ai la foi, et elle m'a conduit jusqu'ici. »

foreignNames.name: Sacroferro Veterano
foreignNames.text: Scarta una carta: TAPpa il Sacroferro Veterano. Ha indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno. (Il danno e gli effetti che dicono distruggi non lo distruggono.)
foreignNames.flavor: 'Non so se vincerò ogni battaglia. Ma ho fede e mi ha fatto arrivare fin qui.'

foreignNames.name: 歴戦の神聖刃
foreignNames.text: カード１枚を捨てる：歴戦の神聖刃をタップする。ターン終了時まで、これは破壊不能を得る。（ダメージや「破壊」と書かれた効果では、これは破壊されない。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・戦士
foreignNames.flavor: 「いつでも勝てるかどうか分からない。だが私には信仰がある。信仰が私をこれほどまでにした。」

foreignNames.name: 노련한 신성검사
foreignNames.text: 카드 한 장을 버린다: 노련한 신성검사를 탭한다. 노련한 신성검사는 턴종료까지 무적을 얻는다. (피해와 파괴라고 명시된 효과로 파괴되지 않는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: '내가 모든 전투를 이길지를 아는 것은 아니다. 하지만 나한테는 믿음이 있고, 그게 날 여기까지 이끌고 왔지.'

foreignNames.name: Sacrolâmina Veterano
foreignNames.text: Descarte um card: Vire Sacrolâmina Veterano. Ele ganha indestrutível até o final do turno. (O dano e os efeitos que dizem destrua não o destroem.)
foreignNames.flavor: 'Não sei se vou vencer todas as lutas. Mas eu tenho fé, e isso me sustentou até aqui.'

foreignNames.name: Закаленный Мечник Святости
foreignNames.text: Сбросьте карту: поверните Закаленного Мечника Святости. Он получает Неразрушимость до конца хода. (Повреждения и эффекты с указанием «уничтожьте» не уничтожают его.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Я не знаю, выйду ли победителем из каждой новой битвы. Но у меня есть вера, и до сих пор она не подводила меня».

foreignNames.name: 干练圣剑兵
foreignNames.text: 弃一张牌：横置干练圣剑兵。它获得不灭异能直到回合结束。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「我不知道我还能继续赢多久。但我有坚定信念，而这正是我动力源泉。」

foreignNames.name: 幹練聖劍兵
foreignNames.text: 棄一張牌：橫置幹練聖劍兵。它獲得不滅異能直到回合結束。（傷害與註明「消滅」的效應不會將它消滅。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「我不知道我還能繼續贏多久。但我有堅定信念，而這正是我動力源泉。」

cards.originalText: Discard a card: Tap Seasoned Hallowblade. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say destroy don't destroy it.)

cards.name: Secure the Scene
cards.text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
cards.flavor: 'You know it's a great show when the Azorius arrest the props, too!' —Judith, the Scourge Diva

rulings.text: If the target nonland permanent is an illegal target by the time Secure the Scene tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve. No player will create a Soldier token.

foreignNames.name: Den Tatort absichern
foreignNames.text: Schicke eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist, ins Exil. Ihr Beherrscher erzeugt einen 1/1 weißen Soldat-Kreaturenspielstein.
foreignNames.flavor: „Es ist immer ein großes Spektakel, wenn die Azorius sogar die Requisiten konfiszieren!' —Judith, geißelnde Diva

foreignNames.name: Salvaguardar el lugar
foreignNames.text: Exilia el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra. Su controlador crea una ficha de criatura Soldado blanca 1/1.
foreignNames.flavor: '¡Qué gran función! ¡Los azorios hasta arrestan el decorado!.'  —Judith, diva de la flagelación

foreignNames.name: Sécuriser les lieux
foreignNames.text: Exilez le permanent non-terrain ciblé. Son contrôleur crée un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Soldat.
foreignNames.flavor: « Tu sais que le spectacle est réussi quand les Azorius se mettent à arrêter aussi les accessoires ! » —Judith, diva du fléau

foreignNames.name: Proteggere la Zona
foreignNames.text: Esilia un permanente non terra bersaglio. Il suo controllore crea una pedina creatura Soldato 1/1 bianca.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Sai che è un grande spettacolo quando gli Azorius arrestano perfino gli oggetti di scena!' —Judith, la Diva del Flagello

foreignNames.name: 現場保存
foreignNames.text: 土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それを追放する。それのコントローラーは、白の１/１の兵士・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
foreignNames.flavor: 「アゾリウスが小道具を差し押さえに来たときだって、いつも楽しいショーになるでしょ！」 ――災いの歌姫、ジュディス

foreignNames.name: 현장 확보
foreignNames.text: 대지가 아닌 지속물을 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 추방한다. 그 지속물의 조종자는 1/1 백색 병사 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: '아조리우스가 소품들도 체포한다는 것은 그게 바로 멋진 공연이란 뜻이지!' —재앙의 여주인공, 주디스

foreignNames.name: Proteger a Cena
foreignNames.text: Exile a permanente alvo que não seja um terreno. Seu controlador cria uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Soldado.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Você sabe que o show foi bom quando os Azorius chegam apreendendo até os objetos de cena!' — Judith, Diva do Flagelo

foreignNames.name: Выставить Охрану
foreignNames.text: Изгоните целевой не являющийся землей перманент. Контролирующий его игрок создает одну фишку существа 1/1 белый Солдат.
foreignNames.flavor: «Если Азориусы и реквизит арестовывают, то представление точно удалось на славу!» — Джудит, Бичующая Дива

foreignNames.name: 保护现场

foreignNames.flavor: 「当俄佐立人连道具都一起逮捕的时候，你就知道这一定是场好戏！」 ～灾祸歌伶裘蒂丝

foreignNames.text: 放逐目標非地永久物。其操控者派出一個1/1白色士兵衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「當俄佐立人連道具都一起逮捕的時候，你就知道這一定是場好戲！」 ～災禍歌伶裘蒂絲

cards.name: Selfless Savior
cards.text: Sacrifice Selfless Savior: Another target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say destroy don't destroy it.)
cards.flavor: She raised him from an orphaned pup and gave him a life of love. With his last act, he thanked her.

foreignNames.name: Selbstloser Retter
foreignNames.text: Opfere den Selbstlosen Retter: Eine andere Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, erhält Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Schaden und Effekte, die „zerstören, zerstören sie nicht.)
foreignNames.flavor: Sie hat ihn als Welpenwaise aufgezogen und ihm ein Leben voller Liebe geschenkt. In einem letzten Akt dankte er ihr dafür.

foreignNames.name: Salvador altruista
foreignNames.text: Sacrificar el Salvador altruista: Otra criatura objetivo que controlas gana la habilidad de indestructible hasta el final del turno. (El daño y los efectos que dicen destruir no la destruyen.)
foreignNames.flavor: Era un cachorro huérfano hasta que ella lo crió y le dio una vida llena de amor. La última obra de él fue agradecérselo.

foreignNames.name: Sauveur dévoué
foreignNames.text: Sacrifiez le Sauveur dévoué : Une autre créature ciblée que vous contrôlez acquiert l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Les blessures et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne la détruisent pas.)
foreignNames.flavor: Elle l'a recueilli quand il n'était encore qu'un chiot orphelin, et lui a offert une vie pleine d'amour. Il l'a remerciée par son dernier geste.

foreignNames.name: Salvatore Altruista
foreignNames.text: Sacrifica il Salvatore Altruista: Un'altra creatura bersaglio che controlli ha indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno. (Il danno e gli effetti che dicono distruggi non la distruggono.)
foreignNames.flavor: Lo raccolse quando era un cucciolo abbandonato e gli regalò una vita piena di affetto. Lui decise di ringraziarla con il suo ultimo gesto.

foreignNames.name: 無私の救助犬
foreignNames.text: 無私の救助犬を生け贄に捧げる：他の、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは破壊不能を得る。（ダメージや「破壊」と書かれた効果では、それは破壊されない。）
foreignNames.flavor: 捨てられていた子犬は彼女に育てられ愛情に満ちた生活を得た。最後の行動は、彼女への感謝だった。

foreignNames.name: 헌신적인 구조견
foreignNames.text: 헌신적인 구조견을 희생한다: 당신이 조종하는 다른 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 무적을 얻는다. (피해와 파괴라고 명시된 효과로 파괴되지 않는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 그녀는 어미를 잃은 강아지 때부터 그 개를 기르며 평생의 사랑을 쏟아부었다. 그 개는 자신의 마지막 행동을 통해 그녀에게 보답했다.

foreignNames.name: Salvador Altruísta
foreignNames.text: Sacrifique Salvador Altruísta: Outra criatura alvo que você controla ganha indestrutível até o final do turno. (O dano e os efeitos que dizem destrua não a destroem.)
foreignNames.flavor: Ela o adotou quando era um filhote órfão e lhe deu uma vida de amor. Em seu último ato, ele a agradeceu.

foreignNames.name: Самоотверженный Спаситель
foreignNames.text: Пожертвуйте Самоотверженного Спасителя: другое целевое существо под вашим контролем получает Неразрушимость до конца хода. (Повреждения и эффекты с указанием «уничтожьте» не уничтожают его.)
foreignNames.flavor: Подобрав брошенного щенка, она вырастила его, наполнив его жизнь любовью. Своим последним поступком в жизни он отблагодарил ее.

foreignNames.name: 无私救助犬
foreignNames.text: 牺牲无私救助犬：另一个目标由你操控的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）
foreignNames.flavor: 它幼时曾是流浪孤犬，幸好遇她悉心照料，得以一生幸福成长。而这养育之恩，它靠这最后的舍命相助为报。

foreignNames.name: 無私救助犬
foreignNames.text: 犧牲無私救助犬：另一個目標由你操控的生物獲得不滅異能直到回合結束。（傷害與註明「消滅」的效應不會將它消滅。）
foreignNames.flavor: 牠幼時曾是流浪孤犬，幸好遇她悉心照料，得以一生幸福成長。而這養育之恩，牠靠這最後的捨命相助為報。

cards.originalText: Sacrifice Selfless Savior: Another target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say destroy don't destroy it.)

cards.name: Siege Striker
cards.text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) Whenever Siege Striker attacks, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Siege Striker gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature tapped this way.

rulings.text: You choose how many and which creatures to tap while Siege Striker’s ability is resolving. No player may take other actions between the time you make this choice and the time Siege Striker’s power and toughness are raised.
If an attacking creature with vigilance is tapped for Siege Striker’s ability, that creature remains an attacking creature.
If Siege Striker gains vigilance and attacks or attacks and becomes untapped before its last ability resolves, it can be tapped for its own ability.
Once Siege Striker’s ability has resolved, it keeps the power-and-toughness bonus even if some of the tapped creatures leave the battlefield or become untapped.

foreignNames.name: Belagerungskämpfer
foreignNames.text: Doppelschlag (Diese Kreatur fügt sowohl Erstschlags- als auch normalen Kampfschaden zu.) Immer wenn der Belagerungskämpfer angreift, kannst du eine beliebige Anzahl ungetappter Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, tappen. Der Belagerungskämpfer erhält für jede auf diese Weise getappte Kreatur +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Luchador de asedio
foreignNames.text: Daña dos veces. (Esta criatura daña primero y también hace daño de combate normal.) Siempre que el Luchador de asedio ataque, puedes girar cualquier cantidad de criaturas enderezadas que controlas. El Luchador de asedio obtiene +1/+1 hasta el final del turno por cada criatura girada de esta manera.

foreignNames.name: Frappeur de siège
foreignNames.text: Double initiative (Cette créature inflige des blessures de combat d'initiative et des blessures de combat normales.) À chaque fois que le Frappeur de siège attaque, vous pouvez engager n'importe quel nombre de créatures dégagées que vous contrôlez. Le Frappeur de siège gagne +1/+1 jusqu'à la fin du tour pour chaque créature engagée de cette manière.

foreignNames.name: Incursore da Assedio
foreignNames.text: Doppio attacco (Questa creatura infligge sia danno da combattimento da attacco improvviso che danno da combattimento regolare.) Ogniqualvolta l'Incursore da Assedio attacca, puoi TAPpare un qualsiasi numero di creature STAPpate che controlli. L'Incursore da Assedio prende +1/+1 fino alla fine del turno per ogni creatura TAPpata in questo modo.

foreignNames.name: 包囲戦の打撃者
foreignNames.text: 二段攻撃（このクリーチャーは先制攻撃と通常の戦闘ダメージの両方を与える。） 包囲戦の打撃者が攻撃するたび、あなたはあなたがコントロールしているアンタップ状態の望む数のクリーチャーをタップしてもよい。ターン終了時まで、包囲戦の打撃者は、これによりタップしたクリーチャー１体につき＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignNames.name: 공성 타격수
foreignNames.text: 이단공격 (이 생물은 선제공격 전투피해와 일반 전투피해를 둘 다 입힌다.) 공성 타격수가 공격할 때마다, 당신은 당신이 조종하는 언탭된 생물들을 원하는 수만큼 탭할 수 있다. 공성 타격수는 이런 식으로 탭한 생물 한 개당 턴종료까지 +1/+1을 받는다.

foreignNames.name: Golpeador de Cerco
foreignNames.text: Golpe duplo (Esta criatura causa tanto o dano de iniciativa quanto o de combate normal.) Toda vez que Golpeador de Cerco ataca, você pode virar qualquer número de criaturas desviradas que você controla. Golpeador de Cerco recebe +1/+1 até o final do turno para cada criatura virada dessa forma.

foreignNames.name: Осадный Штурмовик
foreignNames.text: Двойной удар (Это существо наносит боевые повреждения как на этапе Первого удара, так и на этапе обычных повреждений.) cards.text: Flying Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

rulings.text: The ability affects each spell that’s not a creature spell, including your own. Creature spells with another type, such as artifact creature spells, aren’t affected.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases (such as that of Vryn Wingmare), then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

cards.name: Discontinuity
cards.text: As long as it's your turn, this spell costs {2}{U}{U} less to cast. End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and this turn and until end of turn effects end.)

rulings.text: Though other spells and abilities that are exiled won’t get a chance to resolve, they don’t count as being countered.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Discontinuity). The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

Ending the turn this way means the following things happen in order: 1) All spells and abilities on the stack are exiled. This includes spells and abilities that can’t be countered. 2) If there are any attacking and blocking creatures, they’re removed from combat. 3) State-based actions are checked. No player gets priority, and no triggered abilities are put onto the stack. 4) The current phase and/or step ends. The game skips straight to the cleanup step. 5) The cleanup step happens in its entirety.

If any triggered abilities do trigger during this process, they’re put onto the stack during the cleanup step. If this happens, players will have a chance to cast spells and activate abilities, then there will be another cleanup step before the turn is over.

Any “at the beginning of the next end step” triggered abilities won’t get the chance to trigger that turn because the end step is skipped. Those abilities will trigger at the beginning of the end step of the next turn.

foreignNames.name: Diskontinuität

(Schicke alle Zaubersprüche und Fähigkeiten vom Stapel ins Exil, einschließlich dieser Karte. Der Spieler, dessen Zug es ist, wirft so viele Karten ab, bis er seine maximale Handkartenzahl erreicht hat. Schaden heilt und „In-diesem-Zug- und „Bis-zum-Ende-des-Zuges-Effekte enden.)

cards.text: Enchant creature You can't choose an untapped creature as this spell's target as you cast it. You control enchanted creature.
cards.flavor: 'I offered to pay him to do the job, but he refused. So I took matters into my own hands.' —Tahim, the Puppetmaster

rulings.text: The middle ability of Enthralling Hold affects only the choice of target as the spell is cast. If the creature becomes untapped before the spell resolves, it still resolves. If a player is allowed to change the spell’s target while it’s on the stack, they may choose an untapped creature. If you put Enthralling Hold onto the battlefield without casting it, you may attach it to an untapped creature.

Gaining control of a permanent doesn’t cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it. They’ll remain attached, but an Aura’s effect that affects “you” still affects its controller rather than you, the controller of an Equipment can move it during their next main phase, and so on.

foreignNames.name: Mitreißender Griff
foreignNames.text: Verzaubert eine Kreatur Du kannst keine ungetappte Kreatur als Ziel dieses Zauberspruchs bestimmen, sowie du ihn wirkst. Du kontrollierst die verzauberte Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich bot ihm an, ihn für den Job zu bezahlen, aber er lehnte ab. Also hab ich die Dinge selbst in die Hand genommen.' —Tahim, Meister der Marionetten

foreignNames.name: Control fascinante
foreignNames.text: Encantar criatura. No puedes elegir una criatura enderezada como el objetivo de este hechizo en cuanto lo lanzas. Tú controlas la criatura encantada.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Le ofrecí pagarle por hacer el trabajo, pero se negó, así que le eché una mano.'  —Táhim, el Titiritero

foreignNames.name: Mainmise charismatique
foreignNames.text: Enchanter : créature Vous ne pouvez pas choisir une créature dégagée comme cible de ce sort au moment où vous le lancez. Vous contrôlez la créature enchantée.

foreignNames.name: Stretta Ammaliante

foreignNames.flavor: 'Mi sono offerto di pagarlo per portare a termine l'incarico, ma lui ha rifiutato. Così ho deciso di prendere in mano la situazione.' —Tahim, il Burattinaio

foreignNames.name: 心酔させる掌握
foreignNames.text: エンチャント（クリーチャー） あなたは、この呪文を唱える時点の対象としてアンタップ状態のクリーチャーを選ぶことはできない。 あなたはエンチャントしているクリーチャーをコントロールする。

foreignNames.flavor: 「仕事をすれば報酬を支払うと言ったのだが、彼は拒んだ。そこで、自分の手で解決することにしたのさ。」 ――人形遣いのタヒム

foreignNames.name: 마음을 사로잡는 움켜쥠
foreignNames.text: 생물에게 부여 당신은 이 주문을 발동하면서 이 주문의 목표를 언탭된 생물로 선택할 수 없다. 당신이 부여된 생물을 조종한다.
foreignNames.flavor: '일을 해 주면 대가를 지불하겠다고 했는데, 그가 거절했지. 그래서 내가 직접 손을 대고 있다네.' —꼭두각시술사, 타힘

foreignNames.name: Domínio Hipnotizante

foreignNames.flavor: «Я предложил заплатить ему за работу, но он отказался. Так что я взял дело в свои руки». — Тахим, кукловод

rulings.text: Because Frantic Inventory is still on the stack while it’s resolving, it doesn’t count towards the number of cards you draw.

foreignNames.flavor: 'Otro pueblo, otra multitud enfurecida. ¿Para qué me molesto en desempaquetar nada?'.

foreignNames.name: 大慌ての棚卸し

foreignNames.name: 정신없는 재고 정리

foreignNames.flavor: '이 마을도 역시나, 또 성난 군중이로군. 짐은 뭐하러 풀어야 하는 거지?'

foreignNames.name: Inventário Frenético
foreignNames.text: Compre um card e, em seguida, compre uma quantidade de cards igual ao número de cards com o nome Inventário Frenético em seu cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Outra vila, outra turba furiosa. Por que diabos eu me dou o trabalho de desfazer as malas?'

foreignNames.name: Лихорадочные Сборы
foreignNames.text: Возьмите карту, затем возьмите количество карт, равное числу карт с именем Лихорадочные Сборы на вашем кладбище.

cards.name: Frost Breath
cards.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor: 'I'll make ice chimes of your bones.'

rulings.text: Frost Breath can target tapped creatures. If a targeted creature is already tapped when the spell resolves, that creature just remains tapped and doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

cards.originalText: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Ghostly Pilferer
cards.text: Whenever Ghostly Pilferer becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card. Whenever an opponent casts a spell from anywhere other than their hand, draw a card. Discard a card: Ghostly Pilferer can't be blocked this turn.

rulings.text: Ghostly Pilferer’s first ability triggers during your untap step, but it’s put onto the stack at the same time as abilities that trigger at the beginning of your upkeep step. Even though the ability triggered first, you may order it before or after other abilities you control that are put onto the stack at this time.
While resolving Ghostly Pilferer’s first ability, you can’t pay more than {2} to draw more than one card.
An ability that triggers when a player casts a spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
Players can cast spells and activate abilities after the second triggered ability resolves but before the spell that caused it to trigger does.
Once Ghostly Pilferer has been blocked, activating its last ability doesn’t cause it to become unblocked.

foreignNames.name: Geisterhafter Dieb
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Geisterhafte Dieb enttappt wird, kannst du {2} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte. Immer wenn ein Gegner einen Zauberspruch von irgendwoher außer von seiner Hand wirkt, ziehe eine Karte. Wirf eine Karte ab: Der Geisterhafte Dieb kann in diesem Zug nicht geblockt werden.

foreignNames.name: Ladronzuelo fantasmal
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Ladronzuelo fantasmal se enderece, puedes pagar {2}. Si lo haces, roba una carta. Siempre que un oponente lance un hechizo desde cualquier parte excepto desde su mano, roba una carta. Descartar una carta: El Ladronzuelo fantasmal no puede ser bloqueado este turno.

foreignNames.name: Chapardeur fantomal
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Chapardeur fantomal devient dégagé, vous pouvez payer {2}. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte. À chaque fois qu'un adversaire lance un sort depuis autre part que sa main, piochez une carte. Défaussez-vous d'une carte : Le Chapardeur fantomal ne peut pas être bloqué ce tour-ci.

foreignNames.name: Saccheggiatore Incorporeo

Ogniqualvolta un avversario lancia una magia da una zona diversa dalla sua mano, pesca una carta. Scarta una carta: Il Saccheggiatore Incorporeo non può essere bloccato in questo turno.

foreignNames.name: 幽体のこそ泥
foreignNames.text: 幽体のこそ泥がアンタップ状態になるたび、あなたは{2}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、カードを１枚引く。 対戦相手が自分の手札以外の領域から呪文を唱えるたび、あなたはカードを１枚引く。 カード１枚を捨てる：このターン、幽体のこそ泥はブロックされない。

foreignNames.name: 유령 좀도둑
foreignNames.text: 유령 좀도둑이 언탭될 때마다, 당신은 {2}를 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다. 상대가 자신의 손을 제외한 어디에서든 주문을 발동할 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다. 카드 한 장을 버린다: 유령 좀도둑은 이번 턴에 방어당할 수 없다.

foreignNames.name: Gatuno Fantasmagórico
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Gatuno Fantasmagórico se torna desvirado, você pode pagar {2}. Se fizer isso, compre um card. Toda vez que um oponente conjurar uma mágica de qualquer zona diferente da própria mão, compre um card. Descarte um card: Gatuno Fantasmagórico não pode ser bloqueado neste turno.

foreignNames.name: Призрачный Воришка

Каждый раз, когда оппонент разыгрывает заклинание откуда угодно, кроме своей руки, возьмите карту. Сбросьте карту: Призрачный Воришка не может быть заблокирован в этом ходу.

foreignNames.name: 魂魅小偷
foreignNames.text: 每当魂魅小偷成为未横置时，你可以支付{2}。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。 每当任一对手从其手牌以外的任何区域施放咒语时，你抓一张牌。 弃一张牌：魂魅小偷本回合不能被阻挡。

foreignNames.name: 魂魅小偷
foreignNames.text: 每當魂魅小偷成為未橫置時，你可以支付{2}。若你如此作，則抽一張牌。 每當任一對手從其手牌以外的任何區域施放咒語時，你抽一張牌。 棄一張牌：魂魅小偷本回合不能被阻擋。

cards.originalText: Whenever Ghostly Pilferer becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card. Whenever an opponent casts a spell from anywhere other than their hand, draw a card. Discard a card: Ghostly Pilferer can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Jeskai Elder
cards.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Jeskai Elder deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

rulings.text: Any spell you cast that doesn’t have the type creature will cause prowess to trigger. If a spell has multiple types, and one of those types is creature (such as an artifact creature), casting it won’t cause prowess to trigger. Playing a land also won’t cause prowess to trigger.
Prowess goes on the stack on top of the spell that caused it to trigger. It will resolve before that spell.
Once it triggers, prowess isn’t connected to the spell that caused it to trigger. If that spell is countered, prowess will still resolve.
You draw a card and discard a card all while Jeskai Elder’s ability is resolving. Nothing can happen between the two, and no player may choose to take actions.

foreignNames.name: Jeskai-Älteste
foreignNames.text: Bravour (Immer wenn du einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch wirkst, erhält diese Kreatur +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.) Immer wenn die Jeskai-Älteste einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kannst du eine Karte ziehen. Falls du dies tust, wirf eine Karte ab.

foreignNames.text: Искусность (Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете не являющееся существом заклинание, это существо получает +1/+1 до конца хода.) Каждый раз, когда Старейшина Джескайцев наносит боевые повреждения игроку, вы можете взять карту. Если вы это делаете, сбросьте карту.
