cards.name: Pursued Whale
cards.text: When Pursued Whale enters the battlefield, each opponent creates a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with This creature can't block and Creatures you control attack each combat if able.' Spells your opponents cast that target Pursued Whale cost {3} more to cast.

rulings.text: If a creature affected by the Pirate token can’t attack for any reason (such as being tapped or having come under that player’s control that turn), then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having it attack, the player isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases (such as that of Pursued Whale), then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

foreignNames.name: Verfolgter Wal
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Verfolgte Wal ins Spiel kommt, erzeugt jeder Gegner einen 1/1 roten Pirat-Kreaturenspielstein mit „Diese Kreatur kann nicht blocken und „Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, greifen in jedem Kampf an, falls möglich.' Zaubersprüche, die deine Gegner wirken und die den Verfolgten Wal als Ziel haben, kosten beim Wirken {3} mehr.

foreignNames.name: Ballena perseguida
foreignNames.text: Cuando la Ballena perseguida entre al campo de batalla, cada oponente crea una ficha de criatura Pirata roja 1/1 con Esta criatura no puede bloquear y Las criaturas que controlas atacan cada combate si pueden.'  A tus oponentes les cuesta {3} más lanzar hechizos que hagan objetivo a la Ballena perseguida.

foreignNames.name: Baleine pourchassée
foreignNames.text: Quand la Baleine pourchassée arrive sur le champ de bataille, chaque adversaire crée un jeton de créature 1/1 rouge Pirate avec « Cette créature ne peut pas bloquer » et « Les créatures que vous contrôlez attaquent à chaque combat si possible. » Les sorts que vos adversaires lancent qui ciblent la Baleine pourchassée coûtent {3} de plus à lancer.

foreignNames.name: Balena Braccata
foreignNames.text: Quando la Balena Braccata entra nel campo di battaglia, ogni avversario crea una pedina creatura Pirata 1/1 rossa con Questa creatura non può bloccare e Le creature che controlli attaccano in ogni combattimento, se possono farlo.'  Le magie che i tuoi avversari lanciano e che bersagliano la Balena Braccata costano {3} in più per essere lanciate.

foreignNames.name: 追われる鯨
foreignNames.text: 追われる鯨が戦場に出たとき、各対戦相手はそれぞれ、「このクリーチャーではブロックできない。」と「各戦闘で、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーは可能なら攻撃する。」を持つ赤の１/１の海賊・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。 対戦相手が追われる鯨を対象として呪文を唱えるためのコストは{3}多くなる。

foreignNames.name: 뒤쫓기는 고래
foreignNames.text: 뒤쫓기는 고래가 전장에 들어올 때, 각 상대는 이 생물은 방어할 수 없다.' 및 당신이 조종하는 생물들은 가능하면 매 전투마다 공격한다.를 가진 1/1 적색 해적 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다. 당신의 상대들이 뒤쫓기는 고래를 목표로 발동하는 주문은 발동하는 데 {3}이 더 든다.

foreignNames.name: Baleia Perseguida
foreignNames.text: Quando Baleia Perseguida entra no campo de batalha, cada oponente cria uma ficha de criatura vermelha 1/1 do tipo Pirata com Esta criatura não pode bloquear e As criaturas que você controla atacam a cada combate se estiverem aptas.'  As mágicas que seus oponentes conjuram com Baleia Perseguida como alvo custam {3} a mais para serem conjuradas.

foreignNames.name: Загнанный Кит
foreignNames.text: Когда Загнанный Кит выходит на поле битвы, каждый оппонент создает одну фишку существа 1/1 красный Пират со способностями «Это существо не может блокировать» и «Существа под вашим контролем атакуют в каждом бою, если могут». Разыгрывание вашими оппонентами заклинаний, целью которых является Загнанный Кит, стоит на {3} больше.

foreignNames.name: 遭猎白鲸
foreignNames.text: 当遭猎白鲸进战场时，每位对手各派出一个1/1红色海盗衍生生物，且具有「此生物不能进行阻挡」与「由你操控的生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。」 对手施放之以遭猎白鲸为目标的咒语增加{3}来施放。

foreignNames.name: 遭獵白鯨
foreignNames.text: 當遭獵白鯨進戰場時，每位對手各派出一個1/1紅色海盜衍生生物，且具有「此生物不能進行阻擋」與「由你操控的生物每次戰鬥若能攻擊，則必須攻擊。」 對手施放之以遭獵白鯨為目標的咒語增加{3}來施放。

cards.originalText: When Pursued Whale enters the battlefield, each opponent creates a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with This creature can't block and Creatures you control attack each combat if able.' Spells your opponents cast that target Pursued Whale cost {3} more to cast.

cards.name: Rain of Revelation
cards.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: 'As the sky opened up, we ran for shelter. Halfway there I came to the sudden realization that, already soaked, there might be more to gain from experiencing the rain than running from it.'

foreignNames.name: Regen der Offenbarung
foreignNames.text: Ziehe drei Karten und wirf dann eine Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: „Als der Himmel sich auftat, rannten wir in Richtung Unterschlupf. Auf halber Strecke und schon klitschnass wurde mir klar, dass wir mehr davon haben, wenn wir ihn mit offenen Armen willkommen heißen.'

foreignNames.name: Lluvia de la revelación
foreignNames.text: Roba tres cartas, luego descarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: 'En cuanto el cielo se abrió, corrimos a buscar refugio. A medio camino me di cuenta de que, como ya estaba empapada, tenía más que ganar si dejaba que la lluvia cayera sobre mí que si huía de ella'.

foreignNames.name: Pluie de révélation
foreignNames.text: Piochez trois cartes, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Lorsque la pluie a commencé à tomber, nous avons couru nous mettre à l'abri. À mi-chemin, j'ai soudain pris conscience qu'étant déjà trempée, j'avais peut-être plus à gagner à connaître la pluie qu'à la fuir. »

foreignNames.name: Pioggia di Rivelazione
foreignNames.text: Pesca tre carte, poi scarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Quando il cielo si aprì, corremmo a cercare riparo. A metà strada, d'improvviso mi resi conto che, essendo già inzuppata d'acqua, potevo forse trarre maggior frutto accogliendo la pioggia invece di rifuggirla.'

foreignNames.name: 啓示の雨
foreignNames.text: カードを３枚引き、その後カード１枚を捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 「急な土砂降りに、屋根の下へと走りました。その途中、もうずぶ濡れでしたが、突然気付いたのです。雨から逃れるよりも、雨を体験した方が、多くを得られるのではないかと。」

foreignNames.name: 계시의 비
foreignNames.text: 카드 세 장을 뽑은 후, 카드 한 장을 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: '하늘에서 비가 쏟아지자, 우리는 비를 피할 곳으로 달려갔다. 반쯤 도착했을 때쯤, 나는 이미 푹 젖은 채로 갑자기, 비에서 도망치는 것보다 비를 경험해 보는 것에서 얻는 것이 더 많을지도 모른다는 것을 깨달았다.'

foreignNames.name: Chuva de Revelação
foreignNames.text: Compre três cards e depois descarte um card.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Quando o céu se derramou, corremos em busca de abrigo. Na metade do caminho percebi que, já encharcado, poderia valer mais a pena aproveitar a chuva do que correr dela.'

foreignNames.name: Дождь Откровения
foreignNames.text: Возьмите три карты, затем сбросьте карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Когда разверзлось небо, мы побежали в укрытие. Но на полпути я внезапно поняла, что мы уже промокли — так что для нас будет полезнее остаться под дождем, а не убегать от него».

foreignNames.name: 揭示之雨
foreignNames.text: 抓三张牌，然后弃一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「天空突然暴雨倾盆，我们匆忙寻地躲避。但在找到半路时，我一时兴起：既然已全身湿透，为何不索性漫步雨中？这样或许能有更多收获。」

foreignNames.name: 揭示之雨
foreignNames.text: 抽三張牌，然後棄一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「天空突然暴雨傾盆，我們匆忙尋地躲避。但在找到半路時，我一時興起：既然已全身濕透，為何不索性漫步雨中？這樣或許能有更多收穫。」

cards.originalText: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

cards.name: Read the Tides
cards.text: Choose one — • Draw three cards. • Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor: Charts and instruments work fine, but the best navigators aren't above a spell or two to nudge the tides in a more favorable direction.

foreignNames.name: Die Gezeiten lesen
foreignNames.text: Bestimme eines — • Ziehe drei Karten. • Bringe bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Karten und Instrumente funktionieren gut, doch selbst die besten Navigatoren sind sich nicht zu fein für ein, zwei Zaubersprüche, die die Gezeiten in eine günstigere Richtung lenken.

foreignNames.name: Conocer las mareas
foreignNames.text: Elige uno: • Roba tres cartas. • Regresa hasta dos criaturas objetivo a las manos de sus propietarios.
foreignNames.flavor: Los mapas y los instrumentos funcionan bien, pero los mejores navegantes solo necesitan uno o dos hechizos para impulsar las mareas en una dirección más favorable.

foreignNames.name: Déchiffrage des marées
foreignNames.text: Choisissez l'un — • Piochez trois cartes. • Renvoyez jusqu'à deux créatures ciblées dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.
foreignNames.flavor: Les plans et les instruments sont pratiques, mais les meilleurs navigateurs ne sont jamais contre un sort ou deux qui pourraient leur donner des marées plus favorables.

foreignNames.name: Leggere le Maree
foreignNames.text: Scegli uno — • Pesca tre carte. • Fai tornare fino a due creature bersaglio in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.
foreignNames.flavor: Mappe e strumenti sono utili, ma i migliori navigatori non disdegnano di lanciare una magia o due per spingere le maree in una direzione più favorevole.

foreignNames.name: 潮読み
foreignNames.text: 以下から１つを選ぶ。 • カードを３枚引く。 • クリーチャー最大２体を対象とし、それらをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 海図や計器も役には立つが、最高の航海士ですらも、潮の流れを変えてしまう呪文には敵わない。

foreignNames.name: 파도 읽기
foreignNames.text: 하나를 선택한다 — • 카드 세 장을 뽑는다. • 생물을 최대 두 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 생물들을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 도표와 계측기들도 좋긴 하지만, 최고의 항해사라고 해도 파도를 좀 더 좋은 방향으로 밀어주는 주문 한두 번과 그다지 차이가 나지 않는다.

foreignNames.name: Ler as Marés
foreignNames.text: Escolha um — • Compre três cards. • Devolva até duas criaturas alvo para as mãos de seus donos.
foreignNames.flavor: As cartas náuticas e os instrumentos funcionam bem, mas os melhores navegadores não abrem mão de um pouco de magia para dar um empurrãozinho favorável nas marés.

foreignNames.name: Гадание по Приливам
foreignNames.text: Выберите одно — • Возьмите три карты. • Верните не более двух целевых существ в руки их владельцев.
foreignNames.flavor: Карты и инструменты — это хорошо, но лучшие навигаторы не гнушаются и заклинанием-другим, чтобы подправить направление течений.

foreignNames.name: 研判浪潮
foreignNames.text: 选择一项～ •抓三张牌。 •将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 海图和器具固然有用，但最好的领航员只消一两个咒语就能让浪潮朝着自己想要的方向流动。

foreignNames.name: 研判浪潮
foreignNames.text: 選擇一項～ •抽三張牌。 •將至多兩個目標生物移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 海圖和器具固然有用，但最好的領航員只消一兩個咒語就能讓浪潮朝著自己想要的方向流動。

cards.originalText: Choose one — • Draw three cards. • Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Rewind
cards.text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
cards.flavor: 'The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory.'

rulings.text: Rewind targets only a spell. It doesn’t target any lands. The lands are chosen as Rewind resolves.
You can choose up to four lands, no matter who controls any of them. Those lands untap once. You can’t choose one land and have it untap four times, for example.

If the spell is an illegal target when Rewind tries to resolve, perhaps because it was countered by another spell or ability, Rewind won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t untap any lands.

foreignNames.name: Zurückdrehen
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Enttappe bis zu vier Länder.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die besten Verweigerungszauber funktionieren ganz einfach: Sie rauben die Erinnerung und lassen das Umfeld intakt.'

foreignNames.name: Retroceder
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Endereza hasta cuatro tierras.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Las mejores negaciones no son más que eso: un principio y un final inalterados, un sueño sin memoria'.

foreignNames.name: Rembobinage
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Dégagez jusqu'à quatre terrains.
foreignNames.flavor: « Le meilleur déni se résume ainsi : un commencement et une fin inchangés, un rêve qui ne laisse pas de trace dans la mémoire. »

foreignNames.name: Rifare
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. STAPpa fino a quattro terre.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Il miglior diniego è semplicemente questo: un inizio e una fine immutati, un sogno di cui non si serbano ricordi.'

foreignNames.name: 巻き直し
foreignNames.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。土地最大４つをアンタップする。
foreignNames.flavor: 「一番強烈な否認というのは、要するに『始めと終わりはそのままで、記憶に残らない夢』だ。」

foreignNames.name: 되감기
foreignNames.text: 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다. 대지를 최대 네 개까지 언탭한다.
foreignNames.flavor: '최고의 부정은 시작과 끝을 그대로 둔 채 기억만을 없앤 꿈과도 같다.'

foreignNames.name: Retroceder
foreignNames.text: Anule a mágica alvo. Desvire até quatro terrenos.
foreignNames.flavor: 'As melhores negações são simplesmente isso: um começo e fim inalterados, um sonho sem memória.'

foreignNames.name: Перемотка
foreignNames.text: Отмените целевое заклинание. Разверните до четырех земель.
foreignNames.flavor: «Такую природу имеют лучшие запреты. Начало и конец неизменны, сон без сновидений, ускользающий из памяти».

foreignNames.name: 倒退
foreignNames.text: 反击目标咒语。重置至多四个地。
foreignNames.flavor: 「最出色的否定就像这样：开始与结束没有任何变化，一如没留下记忆的梦。」

foreignNames.name: 倒退
foreignNames.text: 反擊目標咒語。重置至多四個地。
foreignNames.flavor: 「最出色的否定就像這樣：開始與結束沒有任何變化，一如沒留下記憶的夢。」

cards.originalText: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.

cards.name: Riddleform
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may have Riddleform become a 3/3 Sphinx creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn. {2}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

rulings.text: Riddleform’s first ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger but after targets for that spell are chosen. It will resolve even if that spell is countered.
If Riddleform becomes a creature the same turn it enters the battlefield, you can’t attack with it unless it gains haste.

foreignNames.name: Rätselgestalt
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn du einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch wirkst, kannst du die Rätselgestalt zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Typen bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 3/3 Sphinx-Kreatur mit Flugfähigkeit werden lassen. {2}{U}: Hellsicht 1. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst sie unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignNames.name: Forma enigmática
foreignNames.text: Siempre que lances un hechizo que no sea de criatura, puedes hacer que la Forma enigmática se convierta en una criatura Esfinge 3/3 con la habilidad de volar además de sus otros tipos hasta el final del turno. {2}{U}: Adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)

foreignNames.name: Énigmomorphe
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort non-créature, vous pouvez faire que l'Énigmomorphe devienne une créature 3/3 Sphinx avec le vol en plus de ses autres types jusqu'à la fin du tour. {2}{U} : Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez la mettre au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)

foreignNames.name: Enigmorfo
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia non creatura, puoi far diventare l'Enigmorfo una creatura Sfinge 3/3 con volare in aggiunta ai suoi altri tipi fino alla fine del turno. {2}{U}: Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)

foreignNames.name: 謎変化
foreignNames.text: あなたがクリーチャーでない呪文を唱えるたび、あなたは「ターン終了時まで、謎変化はこれの他のタイプに加えて飛行を持つ３/３のスフィンクス・クリーチャーになる。」を選んでもよい。 {2}{U}：占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）

foreignNames.name: 수수께끼형상
foreignNames.text: 당신이 생물이 아닌 주문을 발동할 때마다, 당신은 수수께끼형상이 턴종료까지 자신의 원래 유형에 더불어 비행을 가진 3/3 스핑크스 생물이 되도록 할 수 있다. {2}{U}: 점술 1을 한다. (당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignNames.name: Enigmorfo
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que conjura uma mágica que não seja de criatura, você pode fazer com que Enigmorfo se torne uma criatura 3/3 do tipo Esfinge com voar além de seus outros tipos até o final do turno. {2}{U}: Vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)

foreignNames.name: Личина Загадок
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете не являющееся существом заклинание, вы можете заставить Личину Загадок стать существом 3/3 Сфинкс с Полетом в дополнение к ее другим типам до конца хода. {2}{U}: предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)

foreignNames.name: 迷幻形体
foreignNames.text: 每当你施放非生物咒语时，你可以令迷幻形体成为3/3，具飞行异能的史芬斯生物直到回合结束，且仍具有原本类别。 {2}{U}：占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

foreignNames.name: 迷幻形體
foreignNames.text: 每當你施放非生物咒語時，你可以令迷幻形體成為3/3，具飛行異能的史芬斯生物直到回合結束，且仍具有原本類別。 {2}{U}：占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）

cards.originalText: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may have Riddleform become a 3/3 Sphinx creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn. {2}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Roaming Ghostlight
cards.text: Flying When Roaming Ghostlight enters the battlefield, return up to one target non-Spirit creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Some who die senseless deaths return as formless spirits, seeking answers where there are none.

foreignNames.name: Umherstreifendes Geisterlicht
foreignNames.text: Fliegend Wenn das Umherstreifende Geisterlicht ins Spiel kommt, bringe bis zu eine Nicht-Geist-Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Einige, die sinnlose Tode sterben, kehren als gestaltlose Geister zurück, Antworten suchend, wo es keine gibt.

foreignNames.name: Luz fantasmal deambuladora
foreignNames.text: Vuela. Cuando la Luz fantasmal deambuladora entre al campo de batalla, regresa hasta una criatura objetivo que no sea Espíritu a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Algunos de los que mueren de forma insensata regresan como espíritus sin forma y buscan respuestas donde no las hay.

foreignNames.name: Luminesprit errant
foreignNames.text: Vol Quand le Luminesprit errant arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez jusqu'à une créature non-Esprit ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Ceux qui meurent pour rien reviennent parfois en tant qu'esprits informes cherchant des réponses là où il n'y en a pas.

foreignNames.name: Lume Fatuo Vagante
foreignNames.text: Volare Quando il Lume Fatuo Vagante entra nel campo di battaglia, fai tornare fino a una creatura non Spirito bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Alcuni muoiono di una morte insensata e ritornano come spiriti senza forma, alla ricerca di risposte laddove non ce ne sono.

foreignNames.name: うろつく光霊

cards.name: Sanctum of Calm Waters
cards.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of Shrines you control. If you do, discard a card.
cards.flavor: Truth lurks in the depths, Invisible from the shore. Knowledge inundates.

rulings.text: You draw X cards and discard a card all while the triggered ability is resolving. Nothing can happen between the two, and no player may choose to take actions.

If Sanctum of Calm Waters leaves the battlefield while its ability is on the stack, you may control no Shrines as the ability resolves. If so, you may choose to draw zero cards and discard one, or you may choose not to draw zero cards and not discard a card.
Each Shrine has an ability that counts the number of Shrines you control. These abilities include the Shrine they’re printed on.
Shrines count only enchantments with the subtype Shrine. Other cards with “shrine” in their name (such as Jungle Shrine, Luxa River Shrine, and Nantuko Shrine) don’t count.

foreignNames.name: Heiligtum der ruhigen Gewässer
foreignNames.text: Zu Beginn deiner Hauptphase vor dem Kampf kannst du X Karten ziehen, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Schreinen ist, die du kontrollierst. Falls du dies tust, wirf eine Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Wahrheit lauert in den Tiefen. Vom Ufer aus unsichtbar, von Wissen überflutet.

foreignNames.name: Santuario de las aguas tranquilas

cards.name: See the Truth
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. If this spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, put each of those cards into your hand instead.
cards.flavor: 'What is this that is neither future nor past?'

rulings.text: See the Truth doesn’t give you permission to cast it from a zone other than your hand. You’ll need to find another way to do so.
If an effect copies See the Truth while it’s on the stack, the copy wasn’t cast at all, so you only get one of the cards it has you look at.

foreignNames.name: Die Wahrheit erkennen
foreignNames.text: Schaue dir die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine der Karten auf deine Hand und lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek. Falls dieser Zauberspruch von irgendwoher außer von deiner Hand gewirkt wurde, nimm stattdessen alle jener Karten auf deine Hand.
foreignNames.flavor: „Was ist das, das weder Zukunft noch Vergangenheit ist?'

foreignNames.name: Ver la verdad
foreignNames.text: Mira las tres primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de esas cartas en tu mano y el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden. Si este hechizo se lanzó desde cualquier parte excepto desde tu mano, en vez de eso, pon cada una de esas cartas en tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: '¿Qué es esto que no es ni futuro ni pasado?'.

foreignNames.name: Voir la Vérité
foreignNames.text: Regardez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une de ces cartes dans votre main et le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans l'ordre de votre choix. Si ce sort a été lancé depuis autre part que votre main, mettez chacune de ces cartes dans votre main à la place.
foreignNames.flavor: « Qu'est-ce qui n'est ni passé ni futur ? »

foreignNames.name: Vedere la Verità
foreignNames.text: Guarda le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungi alla tua mano una di quelle carte e metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine. Se questa magia è stata lanciata da una zona diversa dalla tua mano, aggiungi invece ognuna di quelle carte alla tua mano.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Come? Uno stato che non è futuro né passato?'

foreignNames.name: 真実の視認
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを３枚見る。そのうち１枚をあなたの手札に、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。この呪文があなたの手札以外の領域から唱えられていたなら、代わりに、それらのカードをすべてあなたの手札に加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 「過去にあらず、未来にあらず。これは何ぞ？」

foreignNames.name: 진실을 보다
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 세 장을 본다. 그중 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져가고 나머지 카드들은 당신이 원하는 순서로 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓는다. 이 주문이 당신의 손이 아닌 다른 곳에서 발동되었다면, 대신 그 카드들 모두를 당신의 손에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: '미래도 아니고 과거도 아닌 이것은 과연 무엇인가?'

foreignNames.name: Ver a Verdade

foreignNames.flavor: 'O que é isso, que não é futuro nem passado?'

foreignNames.name: Узреть Истину

foreignNames.flavor: «Что это такое — не прошлое и не будущее?»

foreignNames.name: 看清真相
foreignNames.text: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。如果你是从你手牌以外的任何区域施放此咒语，则改为将这些牌都置于你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「有个东西，既不是未来，也不是过去，那是什么？」

foreignNames.flavor: 「有個東西，既不是未來，也不是過去，那是什麼？」

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Stormwing Entity). Stormwing Entity’s cost reduction applies even if the instant or sorcery spell you cast was countered or didn’t resolve.
Stormwing Entity’s cost reduction applies just once, no matter how many instant and sorcery spells you’ve cast this turn.

cards.name: Sublime Epiphany
cards.text: Choose one or more — • Counter target spell. • Counter target activated or triggered ability. • Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. • Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. • Target player draws a card.

rulings.text: You can’t choose any one mode more than once.
If any of the targets become illegal, the remaining targets are affected as appropriate.

If you choose more than one mode, you perform the modes in the order specified. For example, if you choose to counter target spell, return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand, and have target player draw a card, that permanent will be on the battlefield while that spell is countered (and may modify, affect, or trigger on that event) but will not be on the battlefield while that player draws a card.

Sublime Epiphany’s second mode counters only activated and triggered abilities already on the stack. It doesn’t prevent abilities from being activated or from triggering later in the turn, and it has no effect on static abilities.
Activated abilities are written in the form “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities (such as equip) are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder texts.

Triggered abilities use the word “when,” “whenever,” or “at.” They’re often written as “[Trigger condition], [effect].” Some keyword abilities (such as prowess) are triggered abilities and will have “when,” “whenever,” or “at” in their reminder text'.

Abilities that create replacement effects, such as a permanent entering the battlefield tapped or with counters on it, can’t be countered. Abilities that apply “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” are also replacement effects and can’t be countered.

Sublime Epiphany’s second mode can’t counter an activated or triggered mana ability. An activated mana ability is one that adds mana to a player’s mana pool as it resolves, doesn’t have a target, and isn’t a loyalty ability. A triggered mana ability is one that adds mana to a player’s mana pool and triggers on an activated mana ability.

If you counter a delayed triggered ability that triggered at the beginning of the “next” occurrence of a specified step or phase, that ability won’t trigger again the following time that phase or step occurs.

If you choose the third and fourth modes and target the same creature you control both times, you’ll return it and then create a token that’s a copy of it, using its copiable values as it last appeared on the battlefield. This is because the legality of targets is checked only as the spell begins to resolve, before any actions are performed.

The token copies exactly what is printed on the creature and nothing else (unless that creature is a token or is copying something else; see below). It doesn’t copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and/or Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that changed its power, toughness, types, color, and so on.
If the copied creature is itself a token, the token created by Sublime Epiphany copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that created it.
If the copied creature is copying something else, the token enters the battlefield as whatever that creature is copying.
If the copied creature has {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any “As [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[This creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the copied creature will also work.

cards.originalText: Choose one or more — • Counter target spell. • Counter target activated or triggered ability. • Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. • Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. • Target player draws a card.

cards.name: Teferi, Master of Time
cards.text: You may activate loyalty abilities of Teferi, Master of Time on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant. [+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card. [−3]: Target creature you don't control phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.) [−10]: Take two extra turns after this one.

rulings.text: Any creatures that phase in during their controller’s untap step will be able to attack and pay a cost of {T} during that turn.
Teferi’s first ability doesn’t change how many of his abilities you can activate during each turn.
You draw a card and discard a card all while Teferi’s first loyalty ability is resolving. Nothing can happen between the two, and no player may choose to take actions.

While a permanent is phased out, it’s treated as though it doesn’t exist. It can’t be the target of spells or abilities, its static abilities have no effect on the game, its triggered abilities can’t trigger, it can’t attack or block, and so on.
An attacking creature that phases out is removed from combat.
Phasing out doesn’t cause any “leaves the battlefield” abilities to trigger. Similarly, phasing in won’t cause any “enters the battlefield” abilities to trigger.
Any one-shot effects that are waiting “until [this] leaves the battlefield,” such as that of Kitesail Freebooter, won’t happen when a permanent phases out.

Any continuous effects with a “for as long as” duration such as that of Awakener Druid ignore phased-out objects. Any such effects will expire if their conditions are no longer met after ignoring the phased-out objects.

Each Aura and Equipment attached to a permanent that’s phasing out also phases out. They will phase in with that permanent and still be attached to it. Similarly, permanents that phase out with counters phase in with those counters.
Choices made for permanents as they entered the battlefield are remembered when they phase in.

If an opponent gains control of your creature and it phases out and the duration of the control-change effect expires before it phases in, that permanent phases in under your control as that opponent’s next untap step begins. If they leave the game before their next untap step, it phases in as the next untap step begins after their turn would have begun.

foreignNames.name: Teferi, Herr über die Zeit
foreignNames.text: Du kannst Loyalitätsfähigkeiten von Teferi, Herr über die Zeit, im Zug jedes Spielers und zu jedem Zeitpunkt, zu dem du einen Spontanzauber wirken könntest, aktivieren. +1: Ziehe eine Karte und wirf dann eine Karte ab. −3: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du nicht kontrollierst, destabilisiert sich. (Behandle sie und alles, das an sie angelegt ist, bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges ihres Beherrschers, als würden sie nicht existieren.) −10: Du erhältst nach diesem Zug zwei zusätzliche Züge.

foreignNames.name: Teferi, Maestro del Tiempo
foreignNames.text: Puedes activar las habilidades de lealtad de Teferi, Maestro del Tiempo durante el turno de cualquier jugador en cualquier momento en que pudieras lanzar un instantáneo. +1: Roba una carta, luego descarta una carta. −3: La criatura objetivo que no controlas sale de fase. (Trátala a ella y a cualquier permanente anexado a ella como si no existiese hasta el próximo turno de su controlador.) −10: Juega dos turnos adicionales después de este.

foreignNames.name: Téfeiri, maître du temps
foreignNames.text: Vous pouvez activer les capacités de loyauté de Téfeiri, maître du temps pendant le tour de n'importe quel joueur à tout moment où vous pourriez lancer un éphémère. +1: Piochez une carte, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte. -3: Une créature ciblée que vous ne contrôlez pas passe hors phase. (Traitez-la et tout ce qui lui est attaché comme s'ils n'existaient pas jusqu'au prochain tour de son contrôleur.) -10: Jouez deux tours supplémentaires après celui-ci.

foreignNames.name: Teferi, Maestro del Tempo
foreignNames.text: Puoi attivare le abilità di fedeltà di Teferi, Maestro del Tempo durante il turno di qualsiasi giocatore in ogni momento in cui potresti lanciare un istantaneo. +1: Pesca una carta, poi scarta una carta. -3: Una creatura bersaglio che non controlli scompare. (Tratta quella creatura e qualsiasi permanente ad essa assegnato come se non esistessero fino al prossimo turno del controllore della creatura.) -10: Gioca due turni extra dopo questo.

foreignNames.name: 時の支配者、テフェリー
foreignNames.text: あなたは、時の支配者、テフェリーの忠誠度能力を、どのプレイヤーのターンでも、あなたがインスタントを唱えられるときならいつでも起動してよい。 +1：カードを１枚引き、その後カード１枚を捨てる。 -3：あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはフェイズ・アウトする。（それのコントローラーの次のターンまで、それやそれにつけられているものはすべて存在しないかのように扱う。） -10：このターンに続いて追加の２ターンを行う。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のプレインズウォーカー — テフェリー

foreignNames.name: 시간의 대가, 테페리
foreignNames.text: 당신은 순간마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기라면 어느 플레이어의 턴이든 시간의 대가, 테페리의 충성 능력을 활성화할 수 있다. +1: 카드 한 장을 뽑은 후, 카드 한 장을 버린다. −3: 당신이 조종하지 않는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 페이즈 아웃한다. (그 생물의 조종자의 다음 턴까지 그 생물 및 그 생물에 부착되어 있는 것들이 존재하지 않는 것처럼 취급한다.) -10: 이번 턴 후에 추가로 두 턴을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Teferi, Mestre do Tempo
foreignNames.text: Você pode ativar habilidades de lealdade de Teferi, Mestre do Tempo, no turno de qualquer jogador a qualquer momento em que poderia conjurar uma mágica instantânea. +1: Compre um card e depois descarte um card. −3: A criatura alvo que você não controla sai de fase. (Trate-a, assim como qualquer coisa anexada a ela, como se não existisse até o próximo turno de seu controlador.) −10: Jogue dois turnos extras depois deste.

foreignNames.name: Тефери, Властелин Времени
foreignNames.text: Вы можете активировать способности верности Тефери, Властелина Времени во время хода любого игрока при любой возможности разыгрывать мгновенные заклинания. +1: возьмите карту, затем сбросьте карту. −3: целевое существо не под вашим контролем уходит в противофазу. (До следующего хода контролирующего его игрока обращайтесь с ним и всеми прикрепленными к нему объектами, как будто они не существуют.) −10: сделайте два дополнительных хода вслед за этим.

foreignNames.name: 弄时宗师泰菲力
foreignNames.text: 你可以在任意牌手的回合中，于你能够施放瞬间的时机下，起动弄时宗师泰菲力的忠诚异能。 +1：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 -3：目标不由你操控的生物跃离。（直到其操控者的下一个回合，该生物及贴附于其上的所有东西都视作不存在。） -10：于本回合后进行额外的两个回合。

foreignNames.name: 弄時宗師泰菲力
foreignNames.text: 你可以在任意玩家的回合中，於你能夠施放瞬間的時機下，起動弄時宗師泰菲力的忠誠異能。 +1：抽一張牌，然後棄一張牌。 −3：目標不由你操控的生物躍離。（直到其操控者的下一個回合，該生物及貼附於其上的所有東西都視作不存在。） −10：於本回合後進行額外的兩個回合。

cards.originalText: You may activate loyalty abilities of Teferi, Master of Time on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant. +1: Draw a card, then discard a card. −3: Target creature you don't control phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.) −10: Take two extra turns after this one.

cards.name: Teferi's Ageless Insight
cards.text: If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.
cards.flavor: 'Fine, you know more than me. But do you have to be such a show-off about it?' —Chandra Nalaar, to Teferi

rulings.text: If a spell or ability causes you to put a card into your hand without specifically using the word “draw,” it’s not a card drawn.
If two or more replacement effects would apply to a card-drawing event, the player drawing the card chooses the order in which to apply them.

Because Teferi’s Ageless Insight is legendary, it’s unlikely that one player will control two. However, if that happens, each card that player would draw after the first will result in four cards being drawn. If they control three, they draw eight cards, and so on.

foreignNames.name: Teferis zeitlose Einsicht
foreignNames.text: Falls du eine Karte ziehen würdest, abgesehen von der ersten, die du in jedem deiner Ziehsegmente ziehst, ziehe stattdessen zwei Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: „Schön, du weißt also mehr als ich. Aber musst du das so heraushängen lassen?' —Chandra Nalaar, zu Teferi

foreignNames.name: Conocimiento atemporal de Teferi
foreignNames.text: Si fueras a robar una carta, excepto la primera que robas en tus pasos de robar, en vez de eso, roba dos cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Vale, sabes más que yo. Pero ¿tienes que ir presumiendo de ello?.'  —Chandra Nalaar, a Teferi

foreignNames.name: Perspicacité sans âge de Téfeiri
foreignNames.text: Si vous deviez piocher une carte, excepté la première que vous piochez pendant chacune de vos étapes de pioche, piochez deux cartes à la place.
foreignNames.flavor: « D'accord, tu en sais plus que moi. Mais est-ce une raison de jouer les prétentieux ? » —Chandra Nalaàr, à Téfeiri

foreignNames.name: Intuizione Eterna di Teferi
foreignNames.text: Se stai per pescare una carta, tranne la prima che peschi in ognuna delle tue sottofasi di acquisizione, pesca invece due carte.
foreignNames.flavor: 'E va bene, ne sai più di me... Ma devi per forza ostentarlo?' —Chandra Nalaar a Teferi

foreignNames.name: テフェリーの永遠の洞察
foreignNames.text: あなたがあなたの各ドロー・ステップで引く１枚目のカードでないカードを１枚引くなら、代わりにカードを２枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「いいわ。あなたは私より良く知っている。でも、それを見せつけるようなやり方をする必要はあるの？」 ――チャンドラ・ナラーからテフェリーへ

foreignNames.name: 테페리의 영원한 통찰
foreignNames.text: 당신이 당신의 각 뽑기단에 뽑는 첫 카드 이외에 카드를 한 장 뽑으려 한다면, 대신에 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: '알겠어, 당신이 나보다 많이 알아. 하지만 그렇게 잘난 척을 해야만 되는 거야?' —찬드라 날라르, 테페리에게

foreignNames.name: Percepção Atemporal de Teferi
foreignNames.text: Se você for comprar um card além do primeiro que você compra em cada uma das suas etapas de compra, em vez disso, compre dois cards.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Tudo bem, você sabe mais que eu. Mas precisa mesmo ficar se exibindo?' — Chandra Nalaar, para Teferi

foreignNames.name: Вневременное Провидение Тефери
foreignNames.text: Если вы должны взять карту помимо первой карты, которую вы берете в каждом вашем шаге взятия карты, вместо этого возьмите две карты.
foreignNames.flavor: «Ладно, ты знаешь больше меня. Но зачем обязательно так этим кичиться?» — Чандра Налаар, обращаясь к Тефери

foreignNames.name: 泰菲力的永恒洞察
foreignNames.text: 如果你将抓一张牌，且这不是你于自己的每个抓牌步骤中所抓的第一张牌，则改为抓两张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「好啦，你是懂得比我多。但你真的要炫耀这点吗？」 ～茜卓纳拉，致泰菲力

foreignNames.name: 泰菲力的永恆洞察
foreignNames.text: 如果你將抽一張牌，且這不是你於自己的每個抽牌步驟中所抽的第一張牌，則改為抽兩張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「好啦，你是懂得比我多。但你真的要炫耀這點嗎？」 ～茜卓納拉，致泰菲力

cards.originalText: If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.

cards.name: Teferi's Protege
cards.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: Teferi's legacy lives on in Tolaria through the study of time magic and a tradition of irrepressible mischief.

rulings.text: You draw a card and discard a card all while the ability is resolving. Nothing can happen between the two, and no player may choose to take actions.

foreignNames.name: Teferis Schützling
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Ziehe eine Karte und wirf dann eine Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: Teferis Vermächtnis lebt in Tolaria fort durch das Studium der Zeitmagie und einer Tradition von Schalk, Streichen und Unheilstiften.

foreignNames.name: Apadrinada de Teferi
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Roba una carta, luego descarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: El legado de Teferi perdura en Tolaria gracias al estudio de la magia del tiempo y a una tradición de travesuras irreprimibles.

foreignNames.name: Protégée de Téfeiri
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}, {T} : Piochez une carte, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Sur Tolaria, l'héritage de Téfeiri perdure à travers l'étude de la magie temporelle et une tradition de malice irrépressible.

foreignNames.name: Protetta di Teferi
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Pesca una carta, poi scarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: A Tolaria, l'eredità di Teferi sopravvive attraverso lo studio della magia temporale e grazie a una tradizione di spiritosi ribelli.

foreignNames.name: テフェリーの徒弟
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}, {T}：カードを１枚引き、その後カード１枚を捨てる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: トレイリアでは今もテフェリーの伝統が受け継がれている。時間魔法の研究と、取り留めのない悪戯だ。

foreignNames.name: 테페리의 제자
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}, {T}: 카드 한 장을 뽑은 후, 카드 한 장을 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 톨라리아에서 테페리의 유산은 시간 마법에 대한 연구와 억제 불가능한 장난기에 대한 전통을 통해 대대로 전해져 간다.

foreignNames.name: Protegida de Teferi
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Compre um card e depois descarte um card.
foreignNames.flavor: O legado de Teferi sobrevive em Tolária através do estudo da magia do tempo e de uma tradição de rebeldia irrefreável.

foreignNames.name: Протеже Тефери
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}, {T}: возьмите карту, затем сбросьте карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Наследие Тефери сохраняется в Толарии в виде исследований магии времени и традиции необузданных розыгрышей.

foreignNames.name: 泰菲力的门徒
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 对于时间魔法的持续研习和学生间难以克制的作弄传统，让泰菲力的精神得以在陶拉里亚流传。

foreignNames.name: 泰菲力的門徒
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}，{T}：抽一張牌，然後棄一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 對於時間魔法的持續研習和學生間難以克制的作弄傳統，讓泰菲力的精神得以在陶拉里亞流傳。

cards.originalText: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

cards.name: Teferi's Tutelage
cards.text: When Teferi's Tutelage enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever you draw a card, target opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
cards.flavor: 'Tarassel's sixth law of temporal recursion is easy to understand as long as you know the first seven.'

rulings.text: You draw a card and discard a card all while the first ability is resolving. Nothing can happen between the two, and no player may choose to take actions. This means that the second ability is put onto the stack after you’ve finished resolving the first ability.

foreignNames.name: Teferis Belehrung
foreignNames.text: Wenn Teferis Belehrung ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte und wirf dann eine Karte ab. Immer wenn du eine Karte ziehst, millt ein Gegner deiner Wahl zwei Karten. (Er legt die obersten zwei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Tarassels sechstes Gesetz über den temporalen Kreislauf ist leicht zu verstehen, wenn man die ersten sieben kennt.'

foreignNames.name: Tutelaje de Teferi
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Tutelaje de Teferi entre al campo de batalla, roba una carta, luego descarta una carta. Siempre que robes una carta, el oponente objetivo muele dos cartas. (Pone las dos primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.)
foreignNames.flavor: 'La sexta ley de la recurrencia temporal de Tárassel es fácil de entender si comprendes las primeras siete'.

foreignNames.name: Tutelle de Téfeiri
foreignNames.text: Quand la Tutelle de Téfeiri arrive sur le champ de bataille, piochez une carte, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte. À chaque fois que vous piochez une carte, l'adversaire ciblé meule deux cartes. (Il met les deux cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.)
foreignNames.flavor: « La sixième loi de la récursion temporelle de Tarassel est simple à comprendre quand on connait les sept premières. »

foreignNames.name: Tutela di Teferi
foreignNames.text: Quando la Tutela di Teferi entra nel campo di battaglia, pesca una carta, poi scarta una carta. Ogniqualvolta peschi una carta, un avversario bersaglio macina due carte. (Mette nel suo cimitero le prime due carte del suo grimorio.)
foreignNames.flavor: 'La sesta legge della ricorsività temporale di Tarassel è di facile comprensione, purché si conoscano le prime sette.'

foreignNames.name: テフェリーの後見
foreignNames.text: テフェリーの後見が戦場に出たとき、カードを１枚引き、その後カード１枚を捨てる。 あなたがカードを１枚引くたび、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを２枚切削する。（そのプレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上からカードを２枚自分の墓地に置く。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「時間再帰に関するタラッセルの第六法則を理解するのは、最初の七つの法則が分かっていれば簡単さ。」

foreignNames.name: 테페리의 지도
foreignNames.text: 테페리의 지도가 전장에 들어올 때, 카드 한 장을 뽑은 후, 카드 한 장을 버린다. 당신이 카드를 뽑을 때마다, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 카드 두 장을 민다. (그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위 카드 두 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: '시간적 재귀에 대한 타라셀의 여섯 번째 법칙은 자네가 첫 일곱 개 법칙을 알고 있으면 이해하기 쉽다네.'

foreignNames.name: Tutela de Teferi
foreignNames.text: Quando Tutela de Teferi entrar no campo de batalha, compre um card e depois descarte um card. Toda vez que você compra um card, o oponente alvo tritura dois cards. (Ele coloca os dois cards do topo do próprio grimório no próprio cemitério.)
foreignNames.flavor: 'A sexta lei da recursividade temporal de Tarassel é de fácil compreensão, contanto que você conheça as primeiras sete.'

foreignNames.name: Наставничество Тефери
foreignNames.text: Когда Наставничество Тефери выходит на поле битвы, возьмите карту, затем сбросьте карту. Каждый раз, когда вы берете карту, целевой оппонент скручивает две карты. (Он кладет две верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Шестой закон темпоральной рекурсии Тарассель легко понять, если знаешь первые семь».

foreignNames.name: 泰菲力的指导
foreignNames.text: 当泰菲力的指导进战场时，抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 每当你抓一张牌时，目标对手磨两张牌。（他将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「只要你晓得了塔拉希尔时间递归律的前七条，第六条就很容易理解。」

foreignNames.name: 泰菲力的指導
foreignNames.text: 當泰菲力的指導進戰場時，抽一張牌，然後棄一張牌。 每當你抽一張牌時，目標對手磨兩張牌。（他將其牌庫頂的兩張牌置入其墳墓場。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「只要你曉得了塔拉希爾時間遞歸律的前七條，第六條就很容易理解。」

cards.originalText: When Teferi's Tutelage enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever you draw a card, target opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)

cards.name: Tide Skimmer
cards.text: Flying Whenever you attack with two or more creatures with flying, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Fishing boats often follow hunting drakes to find the largest schools of fish.

rulings.text: Tide Skimmer’s ability triggers just once, no matter how many creatures with flying attack beyond the second.
You draw a card even if some or all of the attacking creatures lose flying or leave combat before Tide Skimmer’s ability resolves.

foreignNames.name: Flutgleiter
foreignNames.text: Fliegend Immer wenn du mit zwei oder mehr fliegenden Kreaturen angreifst, ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Fischerboote folgen oft jagenden Sceadas, um die größten Fischschwärme zu finden.

foreignNames.name: Rayaolas
foreignNames.text: Vuela. Siempre que ataques con dos o más criaturas con la habilidad de volar, roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Los barcos pesqueros suelen seguir a los dracos que cazan para encontrar los bancos de peces más grandes.

foreignNames.name: Écumeur du ressac
foreignNames.text: Vol À chaque fois que vous attaquez avec au moins deux créatures avec le vol, piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Les bateaux de pêche suivent souvent les drakôns en chasse pour trouver les plus gros bancs de poissons.

foreignNames.name: Sorvolatore delle Maree
foreignNames.text: Volare Ogniqualvolta attacchi con due o più creature con volare, pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Spesso le barche dei pescatori seguono i draghetti a caccia per trovare i banchi di pesci più grandi.

foreignNames.name: 潮掬い
foreignNames.text: 飛行 あなたが飛行を持つクリーチャー２体以上で攻撃するたび、カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ドレイク
foreignNames.flavor: 釣り船はよくドレイクの捕食の後を追う。最大の魚群が見つかるからだ。

foreignNames.name: 파도를 스치는 드레이크
foreignNames.text: 비행 당신이 비행을 가진 생물 두 개 이상으로 공격할 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 낚싯배들은 종종 사냥 중인 드레이크들을 따라가 더 많은 물고기들을 찾아낸다.

foreignNames.name: Corta-água da Maré
foreignNames.text: Voar Toda vez que você atacar com duas ou mais criaturas com voar, compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Os barcos pesqueiros muitas vezes seguem os dragonetes à caça para encontrar os maiores cardumes.

foreignNames.name: Летун Приливов
foreignNames.text: Полет Каждый раз, когда вы атакуете двумя или более существами с Полетом, возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Рыбацкие лодки зачастую следуют за охотящимися дрейками, чтобы найти самые большие рыбные косяки.

foreignNames.name: 掠浪飞兽
foreignNames.text: 飞行 每当你以两个或更多具飞行异能的生物攻击时，抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 渔船常常跟在行猎龙兽后面，这样便能找到渔获量最大的鱼群。

foreignNames.name: 掠浪飛獸
foreignNames.text: 飛行 每當你以兩個或更多具飛行異能的生物攻擊時，抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 漁船常常跟在行獵龍獸後面，這樣便能找到漁獲量最大的魚群。

cards.originalText: Flying Whenever you attack with two or more creatures with flying, draw a card.

cards.name: Tolarian Kraken
cards.text: Whenever you draw a card, you may pay {1}. When you do, you may tap or untap target creature.
cards.flavor: 'It's contemplative, resourceful, and original. Everything else aside, it's the perfect student.' —Naban, dean of iteration

rulings.text: While resolving Tolarian Kraken’s ability, you can’t pay more than {1} to tap or untap more than one creature.
If a spell or ability causes you to put a card into your hand without specifically using the word “draw,” it’s not a card drawn.

foreignNames.name: Tolarianischer Krake
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn du eine Karte ziehst, kannst du {1} bezahlen. Wenn du dies tust, kannst du eine Kreatur deiner Wahl tappen oder enttappen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Er ist nachdenklich, erfindungsreich und originell. Abgesehen von seinen anderen Eigenschaften ist er der perfekte Schüler.' —Naban, Dekan der Iteration

foreignNames.name: Kraken tolariano
foreignNames.text: Siempre que robes una carta, puedes pagar {1}. Cuando lo hagas, puedes girar o enderezar la criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Es contemplativo, ingenioso y original. Si no tenemos en consideración el resto, es el estudiante perfecto.'  —Naban, decano de la iteración

foreignNames.name: Kraken de Tolaria
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que vous piochez une carte, vous pouvez payer {1}. Quand vous faites ainsi, vous pouvez engager ou dégager la créature ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: « Il est pensif, ingénieux et original. Sans tenir compte du reste, c'est l'élève parfait. » —Naban, doyen de l'itération

foreignNames.name: Kraken di Tolaria
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta peschi una carta, puoi pagare {1}. Quando lo fai, puoi TAPpare o STAPpare una creatura bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: 'È riflessivo, pieno di risorse e originale. Tralasciando tutto il resto, è lo studente perfetto.' —Naban, decano dell'iterazione

foreignNames.name: トレイリアのクラーケン
foreignNames.text: あなたがカードを１枚引くたび、あなたは{1}を支払ってもよい。そうしたとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたはそれをタップまたはアンタップしてもよい。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — クラーケン
foreignNames.flavor: 「思索好きで、才気に富み、独創性がある。他のことはともかく、理想的な学生だ。」 ――反復の学部長、ナバン

foreignNames.name: 톨라리아 크라켄
foreignNames.text: 당신이 카드를 뽑을 때마다, 당신은 {1}을 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 할 때, 생물을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 그 생물을 탭하거나 언탭할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: '심사숙고하고, 재치가 있고, 독창적이야. 다른 건 제쳐 두고, 아주 완벽한 학생이로군.' —반복학과 학과장, 나반

foreignNames.name: Kraken Tolariano
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que você compra um card, você pode pagar {1}. Quando fizer isso, você pode virar ou desvirar a criatura alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Ele é contemplativo, engenhoso e original. Tirando tudo mais, ele é o estudante perfeito.' — Naban, deão das iterações

foreignNames.name: Толарианский Кракен
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда вы берете карту, вы можете заплатить {1}. Когда вы это делаете, вы можете повернуть или развернуть целевое существо.
foreignNames.flavor: «Он думающий, находчивый и отличается оригинальностью. Если отбросить все остальное, для нас это идеальный студент». — Набан, декан итераций

foreignNames.name: 陶拉里亚巨海兽
foreignNames.text: 每当你抓一张牌时，你可以支付{1}。当你如此作时，你可以横置或重置目标生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「它沉着冷静，思维敏捷，做法独到。不考虑其他因素的话，最好的学生就该像它这样。」 ～迭演院长奈班

foreignNames.name: 陶拉里亞巨海獸
foreignNames.text: 每當你抽一張牌時，你可以支付{1}。當你如此作時，你可以橫置或重置目標生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「牠沉著冷靜，思維敏捷，做法獨到。不考慮其他因素的話，最好的學生就該像牠這樣。」 ～迭演院長奈班

cards.originalText: Whenever you draw a card, you may pay {1}. When you do, you may tap or untap target creature.

cards.name: Tome Anima
cards.text: Tome Anima can't be blocked as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.
cards.flavor: Sometimes knowledge takes on a life of its own.

rulings.text: Once Tome Anima has become blocked, it won’t become unblocked if you draw a second card.

foreignNames.name: Zauberbuch-Anima
foreignNames.text: Die Zauberbuch-Anima kann nicht geblockt werden, solange du in diesem Zug zwei oder mehr Karten gezogen hast.
foreignNames.flavor: Manchmal nimmt Wissen ein Eigenleben an.

foreignNames.name: Ánima de los tomos
foreignNames.text: El Ánima de los tomos no puede ser bloqueada mientras hayas robado dos o más cartas este turno.
foreignNames.flavor: En ocasiones el conocimiento cobra vida propia.

foreignNames.name: Anima de grimoire
foreignNames.text: L'Anima de grimoire ne peut pas être bloquée tant que vous avez pioché au moins deux cartes ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: Parfois, la connaissance vit sa propre vie.

foreignNames.name: Essenza dei Tomi
foreignNames.text: L'Essenza dei Tomi non può essere bloccata se hai pescato due o più carte in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: A volte la conoscenza ha una vita propria.

foreignNames.name: 秘本のアニマ
foreignNames.text: このターンにあなたがカードを２枚以上引いているかぎり、秘本のアニマはブロックされない。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — スピリット
foreignNames.flavor: ときに知識は、それ自身が命を持つようになる。

foreignNames.name: 책의 애니마
foreignNames.text: 책의 애니마는 당신이 이번 턴에 카드를 두 장 이상 뽑은 한 방어될 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: 때로는 지식이 스스로 생명을 가지기도 한다.

foreignNames.name: Anima dos Tomos
foreignNames.text: Anima dos Tomos não pode ser bloqueado desde que você tenha comprado dois ou mais cards neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Às vezes, o conhecimento ganha vida própria.

foreignNames.name: Анима Фолиантов
foreignNames.text: Анима Фолиантов не может быть заблокирована при условии, что в этом ходу вы уже взяли не менее двух карт.
foreignNames.flavor: Иногда знания сами по себе обретают жизнь.

foreignNames.name: 魔典活灵
foreignNames.text: 只要你本回合中已抓两张或更多牌，魔典活灵便不能被阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor: 有时候，知识会自己演绎出生命。

foreignNames.name: 魔典活靈
foreignNames.text: 只要你本回合中已抽兩張或更多牌，魔典活靈便不能被阻擋。
foreignNames.flavor: 有時候，知識會自己演繹出生命。

cards.originalText: Tome Anima can't be blocked as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.

cards.name: Unsubstantiate
cards.text: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: 'Nicely done, Jace. You always were good at disappearing acts.' —Liliana Vess

rulings.text: If a spell is returned to its owner’s hand, it’s removed from the stack and thus will not resolve. The spell isn’t countered; it just no longer exists. This works against a spell that can’t be countered.

foreignNames.name: Gegenstandslos machen
foreignNames.text: Bringe einen Zauberspruch oder eine Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand seines bzw. ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: „Gut gemacht, Jace. In Luft auflösen war schon immer deine Stärke.' —Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: Privar de sustancia
foreignNames.text: Regresa el hechizo o la criatura objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Bien hecho, Jace. Siempre se te dieron bien los actos de desaparición.'  —Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: Abolir
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez le sort ciblé ou la créature ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: « Bravo, Jace. Tu as toujours été doué pour les tours de passe-passe. » —Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: Disgregare
foreignNames.text: Fai tornare una magia o una creatura bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Ben fatto, Jace. Hai sempre avuto un talento per le sparizioni.' —Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: 非実体化
foreignNames.text: 呪文１つかクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「上手ね、ジェイス。昔から、消すとか消えるとかが得意だものね。」 ――リリアナ・ヴェス

foreignNames.name: 비실체화
foreignNames.text: 주문 또는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: '잘했어, 제이스. 모습을 감추는 건 언제나 네 특기였지.' —릴리아나 베스

foreignNames.name: Insubstanciar
foreignNames.text: Devolva a mágica ou criatura alvo para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Muito bom, Jace. Você sempre foi ótimo em fazer coisas desaparecerem.' — Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: Лишить Основания
foreignNames.text: Верните целевое заклинание или существо в руку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: «Очень хорошо, Джейс. Исчезновения тебе всегда отлично удавались». — Лилиана Весс

foreignNames.name: 消解
foreignNames.text: 将目标咒语或生物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「干得漂亮，杰斯。你一直很擅长玩失踪这类把戏。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

foreignNames.name: 消解
foreignNames.text: 將目標咒語或生物移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「幹得漂亮，傑斯。你一直很擅長玩失蹤這類把戲。」 ～莉蓮娜維斯

cards.originalText: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Vodalian Arcanist
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.
cards.flavor: The Vodalian Empire tends to be insular. The scholarly Volshe caste are the exception, using education as an antidote to xenophobia.

foreignNames.name: Vodalischer Arkanist
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erzeuge {C}. Verwende dieses Mana nur, um einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei zu wirken.
foreignNames.flavor: Das Vodalische Reich ist weitgehend isoliert. Die Gelehrtenkaste der Volshe bildet eine Ausnahme. Sie nutzt Wissen als Heilmittel gegen die Fremdenfeindlichkeit.

foreignNames.name: Arcanista vodaliano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega {C}. Usa este maná solo para lanzar un hechizo de instantáneo o de conjuro.
foreignNames.flavor: El Imperio vodaliano tiende a ser poco tolerante. La académica casta Volshe constituye una excepción, ya que usan la educación como antídoto para la xenofobia.

foreignNames.name: Arcaniste vodalian
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez {C}. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer un sort d'éphémère ou de rituel.
foreignNames.flavor: L'Empire vodalian fait généralement montre d'un esprit étroit. La caste érudite Volshe constitue une exception, et s'appuie sur l'éducation pour contrer la xénophobie.

foreignNames.name: Arcanista di Vodalia
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi {C}. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare una magia istantaneo o stregoneria.
foreignNames.flavor: L'Impero di Vodalia tende a essere di mentalità ristretta. L'unica eccezione è la casta di studiosi Volshe, che usa l'educazione come antidoto alla xenofobia.

foreignNames.name: ヴォーデイリアの秘儀術師
foreignNames.text: {T}：{C}を加える。このマナは、インスタントやソーサリーである呪文を唱えるためにのみ使用できる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — マーフォーク・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: ヴォーデイリア帝国には孤立主義的な傾向がある。学問を重視するヴォルシェ・カーストは例外で、教育によって外国嫌いを防いでいる。

foreignNames.name: 보달리아 비전술사
foreignNames.text: {T}: {C}를 추가한다. 이 마나는 순간마법 또는 집중마법 주문을 발동하는 데에만 사용할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 보달리아 제국은 다소 배타적인 성향이 있다. 다만 학구적인 볼쉬 계층은 예외로, 이들은 교육을 통해 외부의 것들을 혐오하는 성향을 줄이고자 한다.

foreignNames.name: Arcanista Vodaliano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione {C}. Gaste este mana apenas para conjurar uma mágica instantânea ou um feitiço.
foreignNames.flavor: O Império Vodaliano tende a ser insular. A casta erudita dos Volshe é a exceção, usando a educação como antídoto para a xenofobia.

foreignNames.name: Водалийский Арканист
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте {C}. Тратьте эту ману только на разыгрывание мгновенного заклинания или заклинания волшебства.
foreignNames.flavor: Водалийская империя отличается закрытостью. Ученые из касты Вольше — редкое исключение. Образованность становится для них лекарством от ксенофобии.

foreignNames.name: 伏特里亚奥术师
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{C}。此法术力只能用来施放瞬间或法术咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 伏特里亚帝国通常行事保守。好学的伏尔施阶级则属例外，他们以教育解决排外心态。

foreignNames.name: 伏特里亞奧術師
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{C}。此魔法力只能用來施放瞬間或巫術咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 伏特里亞帝國通常行事保守。好學的伏爾施階級則屬例外，他們以教育解決排外心態。

cards.originalText: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.

cards.name: Waker of Waves
cards.text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0. {1}{U}, Discard Waker of Waves: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: On the open sea, there is nowhere to hide.

rulings.text: You can activate the last ability of Waker of Waves only if it’s in your hand.

foreignNames.name: Erwecker der Wellen
foreignNames.text: Kreaturen, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, erhalten -1/-0. {1}{U}, wirf den Erwecker der Wellen ab: Schaue dir die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine davon auf deine Hand und lege die andere auf deinen Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: Auf offener See kann man sich nicht verstecken.

foreignNames.name: Despiertaolas
foreignNames.text: Las criaturas que controlan tus oponentes obtienen -1/-0. {1}{U}, descartar la Despiertaolas: Mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de ellas en tu mano y la otra en tu cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor: En el mar abierto no hay donde esconderse.

foreignNames.name: Éveilleur des vagues
foreignNames.text: Les créatures que vos adversaires contrôlent gagnent -1/-0. {1}{U}, défaussez-vous de l'Éveilleur des vagues : Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une d'entre elles dans votre main et l'autre dans votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: En pleine mer, il n'y a nulle part où se cacher.

foreignNames.name: Destaonde
foreignNames.text: Le creature controllate dai tuoi avversari prendono -1/-0. {1}{U}, Scarta il Destaonde: Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungine una alla tua mano e metti l'altra nel tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: In mare aperto, non c'è posto in cui nascondersi.

foreignNames.name: 波起こし
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャーは－１/－０の修整を受ける。 {1}{U}, 波起こしを捨てる：あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを２枚見る。そのうち１枚をあなたの手札に、もう１枚をあなたの墓地に置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 大海原には隠れる場所などない。

foreignNames.name: 파도를 깨우는 괴수
foreignNames.text: 당신의 상대들이 조종하는 생물들은 -1/-0을 받는다. {1}{U}, 파도를 깨우는 괴수를 버린다: 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 두 장을 본다. 그중 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져가고 다른 한 장은 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 망망대해에서, 숨을 곳이라고는 없다.

foreignNames.name: Despertador de Ondas
foreignNames.text: As criaturas que seus oponentes controlam recebem -1/-0. {1}{U}, descarte Despertador de Ondas: Olhe os dois cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque um deles na sua mão e o outro em seu cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: Em mar aberto não há onde se esconder.

foreignNames.name: Пробудитель Волн
foreignNames.text: Существа под контролем ваших оппонентов получают -1/-0. {1}{U}, сбросьте Пробудителя Волн: посмотрите две верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Положите одну из них в вашу руку, а другую — на ваше кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor: В открытом море негде спрятаться.

foreignNames.name: 弄涛巨鲸
foreignNames.text: 由对手操控的生物得-1/-0。 {1}{U}，弃掉弄涛巨鲸：检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置入你的坟墓场。
foreignNames.flavor: 在广阔的大海中，没有一处藏身之地。

foreignNames.name: 弄濤巨鯨
foreignNames.text: 由對手操控的生物得-1/-0。 {1}{U}，棄掉弄濤巨鯨：檢視你牌庫頂的兩張牌。將其中一張置於你手上，另一張則置入你的墳墓場。
foreignNames.flavor: 在廣闊的大海中，沒有一處藏身之地。

cards.originalText: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0. {1}{U}, Discard Waker of Waves: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.name: Wall of Runes
cards.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

foreignNames.name: Runenwand
foreignNames.text: Verteidiger (Diese Kreatur kann nicht angreifen.) Wenn die Runenwand ins Spiel kommt, wende Hellsicht 1 an. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst sie unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignNames.name: Muro de runas
foreignNames.text: Defensor. (Esta criatura no puede atacar.) Cuando el Muro de runas entre al campo de batalla, adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)

foreignNames.name: Mur de runes
foreignNames.text: Défenseur (Cette créature ne peut pas attaquer.) Quand le Mur de runes arrive sur le champ de bataille, regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez la mettre au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)

foreignNames.name: Muro di Rune

cards.name: Bad Deal
cards.text: You draw two cards and each opponent discards two cards. Each player loses 2 life.
cards.flavor: There are still places where a smile and a handshake are all you need to seal a deal.

rulings.text: You draw just two cards no matter how many opponents you have.
If an opponent has just one card in hand, that player discards just one card. Other opponents still discard two if able.
Each player loses 2 life, including you, regardless of how many cards they draw or discard.

As Bad Deal resolves, first you draw two cards. Then the next opponent in turn order (or, if it’s an opponent’s turn, the opponent whose turn it is) chooses two cards in hand without revealing them, then each other opponent in turn order does the same. All the chosen cards are discarded at the same time. Then each player loses 2 life.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Bad Deal causes each team to lose 4 life. Your teammate doesn’t draw or discard any cards.

foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T} : Chaque adversaire perd 2 points de vie. N'activez cette capacité que si une créature est morte ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: « Six peines à perpétuité consécutives » prend un tout autre sens quand la nécromancie fait partie de l'équation.

foreignNames.name: Zombie Prigioniero
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Ogni avversario perde 2 punti vita. Attiva questa abilità solo se è morta una creatura in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Sei ergastoli consecutivi assumono tutto un altro significato quando c'è di mezzo la necromanzia.

foreignNames.name: 檻の中のゾンビ
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T}：各対戦相手はそれぞれ２点のライフを失う。この能力は、このターンにクリーチャーが死亡していたときにのみ起動できる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ
foreignNames.flavor: 「終身刑六回分の罪」は、屍術が絡むと意味が変わってくる。

foreignNames.name: 갇힌 좀비
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T}: 각 상대는 생명 2점을 잃는다. 이번 턴에 생물이 죽었을 경우에만 이 능력을 활성화활 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: '6연속 종신형은 사령술이 연관되어 있으면 완전히 새로운 의미가 된다.

foreignNames.name: Zumbi Encarcerado
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Cada oponente perde 2 pontos de vida. Ative esta habilidade somente se uma criatura tiver morrido neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Seis penas consecutivas de prisão perpétua ganha um novo significado quando tem necromancia envolvida.

foreignNames.name: Заключенный Мертвяк
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T}: каждый оппонент теряет 2 жизни. Активируйте эту способность, только если в этом ходу умерло существо.
foreignNames.flavor: «Шесть пожизненных приговоров подряд» приобретает новый смысл, когда в дело вступает некромантия.

foreignNames.name: 困槛灵俑
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}，{T}：每位对手各失去2点生命。只能于有生物死去的回合中起动此异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 当能够动用死灵术时，「六个连续终身监禁」就有了新的意义。

foreignNames.name: 困檻殭屍
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}，{T}：每位對手各失去2點生命。只能於有生物死去的回合中起動此異能。
foreignNames.flavor: 當能夠動用死靈術時，「六個連續終身監禁」就有了新的意義。

cards.originalText: {1}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 2 life. Activate this ability only if a creature died this turn.

cards.name: Carrion Grub
cards.text: Carrion Grub gets +X/+0, where X is the greatest power among creature cards in your graveyard. When Carrion Grub enters the battlefield, mill four cards. (Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Carrion Grub’s first ability applies only while it is on the battlefield. In all other zones, its power is 0.
Any counters on creatures that die or effects that affect them until end of turn won’t apply to those cards in their owner’s graveyard.

foreignNames.name: Aasmade
foreignNames.text: Die Aasmade erhält +X/+0, wobei X gleich der höchsten Stärke unter den Kreaturenkarten in deinem Friedhof ist. Wenn die Aasmade ins Spiel kommt, millst du vier Karten. (Lege die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof.)

foreignNames.name: Larva carroñera
foreignNames.text: La Larva carroñera obtiene +X/+0, donde X es la mayor fuerza entre las cartas de criatura en tu cementerio. Cuando la Larva carroñera entre al campo de batalla, muele cuatro cartas. (Pon las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.)

foreignNames.name: Larve charognarde
foreignNames.text: La Larve charognarde gagne +X/+0, X étant la force la plus élevée parmi les cartes de créature de votre cimetière. Quand la Larve charognarde arrive sur le champ de bataille, meulez quatre cartes. (Mettez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière.)

foreignNames.name: Larva delle Carogne
foreignNames.text: La Larva delle Carogne prende +X/+0, dove X è la forza maggiore tra le carte creatura nel tuo cimitero. Quando la Larva delle Carogne entra nel campo di battaglia, macina quattro carte. (Metti nel tuo cimitero le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio.)

foreignNames.name: 屍肉地虫
foreignNames.text: 屍肉地虫は＋Ｘ/＋０の修整を受ける。Ｘはあなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カードの中で最大のパワーに等しい。 屍肉地虫が戦場に出たとき、カードを４枚切削する。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを４枚あなたの墓地に置く。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 昆虫

foreignNames.name: 시체 유충
foreignNames.text: 시체 유충은 +X/+0을 받는다. X는 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드 중 공격력이 제일 높은 생물 카드의 공격력이다. 시체 유충이 전장에 들어올 때, 카드 네 장을 민다. (당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 네 장을 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.)

foreignNames.name: Larva Necrófaga
foreignNames.text: Larva Necrófaga recebe +X/+0, sendo X o maior poder entre os dos cards de criatura em seu cemitério. Quando Larva Necrófaga entrar no campo de batalha, triture quatro cards. (Coloque os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório em seu cemitério.)

foreignNames.name: Личинка-Падальщик
foreignNames.text: Личинка-Падальщик получает +X/+0, где Х — наибольшее значение силы среди карт существ на вашем кладбище. Когда Личинка-Падальщик выходит на поле битвы, скрутите четыре карты. (Положите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки на ваше кладбище.)

foreignNames.name: 腐肉幼虫
foreignNames.text: 腐肉幼虫得+X/+0，X为你坟墓场里的生物牌中力量最大者的数值。 当腐肉幼虫进战场时，磨四张牌。（将你牌库顶的四张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

foreignNames.name: 腐肉幼蟲
foreignNames.text: 腐肉幼蟲得+X/+0，X為你墳墓場裡的生物牌中力量最大者的數值。 當腐肉幼蟲進戰場時，磨四張牌。（將你牌庫頂的四張牌置入你的墳墓場。）

cards.originalText: Carrion Grub gets +X/+0, where X is the greatest power among creature cards in your graveyard. When Carrion Grub enters the battlefield, mill four cards. (Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Crypt Lurker
cards.text: When Crypt Lurker enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or discard a creature card. If you do, draw a card.
cards.flavor: 'Even the rats refuse to set foot inside. I fear to think what might be waiting in there.' —Gravedigger's journal

rulings.text: While resolving Crypt Lurker’s ability, you can’t sacrifice more than one creature, discard more than one card, or do both to draw more than one card.
Crypt Lurker can be sacrificed to pay the cost of its own triggered ability.

foreignNames.name: Kryptenlauerer
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Kryptenlauerer ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreatur opfern oder eine Kreaturenkarte abwerfen. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Selbst die Ratten setzen keinen Fuß hinein. Ich fürchte mich vor dem, was da drinnen lauern könnte.' —Tagebuch eines Totengräbers

foreignNames.name: Acechador de la cripta
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Acechador de la cripta entre al campo de batalla, puedes sacrificar una criatura o descartar una carta de criatura. Si lo haces, roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Ni siquiera las ratas osan entran. Me da miedo pensar en lo que hay dentro.'  —Diario del sepulturero

foreignNames.name: Guetteur de la crypte
foreignNames.text: Quand le Guetteur de la crypte arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez sacrifier une créature ou vous défausser d'une carte de créature. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Même les rats refusent d'y entrer. Je n'ose pas imaginer ce qui se trouve là-dedans. » —Journal du fossoyeur

foreignNames.name: Predatore della Cripta
foreignNames.text: Quando il Predatore della Cripta entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi sacrificare una creatura o scartare una carta creatura. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Perfino i topi si rifiutano di metterci piede. Tremo al solo pensiero di cosa possa nascondersi là dentro.' —Diario di uno scavatombe

foreignNames.name: 墓所に潜むもの
foreignNames.text: 墓所に潜むものが戦場に出たとき、あなたは、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げるかクリーチャー・カード１枚を捨ててもよい。そうしたなら、カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ホラー
foreignNames.flavor: 「ネズミですら中に入ることを嫌がる。中に何がいるのか考えるだけでも恐ろしい。」 ――墓堀り人の日誌

foreignNames.name: 묘지 잠복꾼
foreignNames.text: 묘지 잠복꾼이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생물 한 개를 희생하거나 생물 카드 한 장을 버릴 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: '쥐들조차도 발을 들이려 하지 않아. 저 안에 뭐가 도사리고 있는지 생각하는 것조차 무섭군.' —무덤 도둑의 일지

foreignNames.name: Espreitador da Cripta
foreignNames.text: Quando Espreitador da Cripta entra no campo de batalha, você pode sacrificar uma criatura ou descartar um card de criatura. Se fizer isso, compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: 'Até os ratos se recusam a pôr os pés ali dentro. Tenho medo só de pensar no que pode estar esperando ali.' — Diário do coveiro

foreignNames.flavor: «Даже крысы туда не суются. Мне страшно подумать, кто мог там притаиться». — дневник могильщика

cards.name: Demonic Embrace
cards.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+1, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types. You may cast Demonic Embrace from your graveyard by paying 3 life and discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs.

rulings.text: Casting Demonic Embrace with the permission granted by its last ability doesn’t change when you can cast it.
If another effect gives you permission to cast Demonic Embrace from your graveyard, you don’t pay the additional cost imposed by its last ability if you use that permission.

If the enchanted creature dies during your turn, you receive priority before any other player does. If you’re allowed to cast Demonic Embrace at that time, you may do so before any player can attempt to remove it from your graveyard.

foreignNames.name: Dämonische Umarmung
foreignNames.text: Verzaubert eine Kreatur Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +3/+1, hat Flugfähigkeit und ist zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Typen ein Dämon. Du kannst die Dämonische Umarmung aus deinem Friedhof wirken, indem du zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Kosten 3 Lebenspunkte bezahlst und eine Karte abwirfst.

foreignNames.name: Abrazo demoníaco
foreignNames.text: Encantar criatura. La criatura encantada obtiene +3/+1, tiene la habilidad de volar y es un Demonio además de sus otros tipos. Puedes lanzar el Abrazo demoníaco desde tu cementerio pagando 3 vidas y descartando una carta además de pagar sus otros costes.

foreignNames.name: Étreinte démoniaque
foreignNames.text: Enchanter : créature La créature enchantée gagne +3/+1, a le vol et est un démon en plus de ses autres types. Vous pouvez lancer l'Étreinte démoniaque depuis votre cimetière en payant 3 points de vie et en vous défaussant d'une carte en plus de payer ses autres coûts.

foreignNames.name: Abbraccio Demoniaco
foreignNames.text: Incanta creatura La creatura incantata prende +3/+1, ha volare ed è un Demone in aggiunta ai suoi altri tipi. Puoi lanciare l'Abbraccio Demoniaco dal tuo cimitero pagando 3 punti vita e scartando una carta oltre a pagare i suoi altri costi.

foreignNames.name: 悪魔の抱擁
foreignNames.text: エンチャント（クリーチャー） エンチャントしているクリーチャーは、＋３/＋１の修整を受け飛行を持ち、それの他のタイプに加えてデーモンでもある。 あなたはあなたの墓地から悪魔の抱擁を、これの他のコストの支払いに加えて、３点のライフを支払い、カード１枚を捨てることで唱えてもよい。
foreignNames.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignNames.name: 악마의 포옹
foreignNames.text: 생물에게 부여 부여된 생물은 +3/+1을 받고, 비행을 가지며, 자신의 다른 유형에 더불어 악마다. 당신은 악마의 포옹의 다른 비용을 지불하는 것에 더불어 생명 3점을 지불하고 카드 한 장을 버려서 악마의 포옹을 당신의 무덤에서 발동할 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Abraço Demoníaco
foreignNames.text: Encantar criatura A criatura encantada recebe +3/+1, tem voar e é um Demônio além de seus outros tipos. Você pode conjurar Abraço Demoníaco de seu cemitério pagando 3 pontos de vida e descartando um card além de pagar seus outros custos.

foreignNames.name: Объятья Демона
foreignNames.text: Зачаровать существо Зачарованное существо получает +3/+1, имеет Полет и является Демоном в дополнение к своим другим типам. Вы можете разыграть Объятья Демона из вашего кладбища, заплатив 3 жизни и сбросив карту в дополнение к оплате других их стоимостей.

foreignNames.name: 恶魔之拥
foreignNames.text: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+3/+1，具有飞行异能，且额外具有恶魔此类别。 你可以从你的坟墓场中施放恶魔之拥，但在其他费用以外，还须额外支付3点生命并弃一张牌。

foreignNames.name: 惡魔之擁
foreignNames.text: 結附於生物 所結附的生物得+3/+1，具有飛行異能，且額外具有惡魔此類別。 你可以從你的墳墓場中施放惡魔之擁，但在其他費用以外，還須額外支付3點生命並棄一張牌。

cards.originalText: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+1, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types. You may cast Demonic Embrace from your graveyard by paying 3 life and discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs.

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor: Resistance is unthinkable.

foreignNames.name: Zwang
foreignNames.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst davon eine Karte, die weder eine Kreatur noch ein Land ist. Der Spieler wirft die bestimmte Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: Widerstand ist undenkbar.

foreignNames.name: Coacción
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra ni criatura. Ese jugador descarta esa carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Resistirse es impensable.

foreignNames.name: Contrainte
foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous y choisissez une carte non-créature non-terrain. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Toute résistance est inconcevable.

foreignNames.name: Costrizione
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra, non creatura da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Opporre resistenza è impensabile.

foreignNames.name: 強迫
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中からクリーチャーでも土地でもないカード１枚を選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 抵抗など考えられない。

foreignNames.name: 구속
foreignNames.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 그중 생물이 아니고 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 선택한다. 그 플레이어는 그 카드를 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 저항은 생각할 수도 없다.

foreignNames.name: Coagir
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo revela a própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja um terreno nem uma criatura da mão dele. Aquele jogador descarta aquele card.
foreignNames.flavor: Resistir é impensável.

foreignNames.name: Насилие
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете из нее карту, не являющуюся ни существом, ни землей. Тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту.
foreignNames.flavor: О сопротивлении нельзя и помыслить.

foreignNames.name: 逼从
